name: Jeremiah 3:16
text: It shall come to pass, when you are multiplied and increased in the land, in those days," says Yahweh, "they shall say no more, "The ark of the covenant of Yahweh!" neither shall it come to mind; neither shall they remember it; neither shall they miss it; neither shall it be made any more.

name: Jeremiah 3:17
text: At that time they shall call Jerusalem "The throne of Yahweh;" and all the nations shall be gathered to it, to the name of Yahweh, to Jerusalem. Neither shall they walk any more after the stubbornness of their evil heart.

name: Jeremiah 3:18
text: In those days the house of Judah shall walk with the house of Israel, and they shall come together out of the land of the north to the land that I gave for an inheritance to your fathers.

name: Jeremiah 3:19
text: "But I said, "How I would put you among the children, and give you a pleasant land, a goodly heritage of the armies of the nations!" and I said, "You shall call me "My Father," and shall not turn away from following me."

name: Jeremiah 3:20
text: "Surely as a wife treacherously departs from her husband, so you have dealt treacherously with me, house of Israel," says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 3:21
text: A voice is heard on the bare heights, the weeping and the petitions of the children of Israel; because they have perverted their way, they have forgotten Yahweh their God.

name: Jeremiah 3:22
text: Return, you backsliding children, I will heal your backsliding. "Behold, we have come to you; for you are Yahweh our God.

name: Jeremiah 3:23
text: Truly in vain is help from the hills, the tumult on the mountains. Truly the salvation of Israel is in Yahweh our God.

name: Jeremiah 3:24
text: But the shameful thing has devoured the labor of our fathers from our youth, their flocks and their herds, their sons and their daughters.

name: Jeremiah 3:25
text: Let us lie down in our shame, and let our confusion cover us; for we have sinned against Yahweh our God, we and our fathers, from our youth even to this day. We have not obeyed the voice of Yahweh our God."

name: Jeremiah 4:1
text: "If you will return, Israel," says Yahweh, "if you will return to me, and if you will put away your abominations out of my sight; then you shall not be removed;

name: Jeremiah 4:2
text: and you shall swear, "As Yahweh lives," in truth, in justice, and in righteousness. The nations shall bless themselves in him, and in him shall they glory."

name: Jeremiah 4:3
text: For thus says Yahweh to the men of Judah and to Jerusalem, "Break up your fallow ground, and don"t sow among thorns.

name: Jeremiah 4:4
text: Circumcise yourselves to Yahweh, and take away the foreskins of your heart, you men of Judah and inhabitants of Jerusalem; lest my wrath go forth like fire, and burn so that none can quench it, because of the evil of your doings.

name: Jeremiah 4:5
text: Declare in Judah, and publish in Jerusalem; and say, "Blow the trumpet in the land!" Cry aloud and say, "Assemble yourselves! Let us go into the fortified cities!"

name: Jeremiah 4:6
text: Set up a standard toward Zion. Flee for safety! Don"t wait; for I will bring evil from the north, and a great destruction."

name: Jeremiah 4:7
text: A lion is gone up from his thicket, and a destroyer of nations; he is on his way, he is gone forth from his place, to make your land desolate, that your cities be laid waste, without inhabitant.

name: Jeremiah 4:8
text: For this clothe yourself with sackcloth, lament and wail; for the fierce anger of Yahweh hasn"t turned back from us.

name: Jeremiah 4:9
text: "It shall happen at that day," says Yahweh, "that the heart of the king shall perish, and the heart of the princes; and the priests shall be astonished, and the prophets shall wonder."

name: Jeremiah 4:10
text: Then I said, "Ah, Lord Yahweh! Surely you have greatly deceived this people and Jerusalem, saying, "You shall have peace;" whereas the sword reaches to the heart."

name: Jeremiah 4:11
text: At that time shall it be said to this people and to Jerusalem, "A hot wind from the bare heights in the wilderness toward the daughter of my people, not to winnow, nor to cleanse;

name: Jeremiah 4:12
text: a full wind from these shall come for me. Now I will also utter judgments against them."

name: Jeremiah 4:13
text: Behold, he shall come up as clouds, and his chariots shall be as the whirlwind: his horses are swifter than eagles. Woe to us! For we are ruined.

name: Jeremiah 4:14
text: Jerusalem, wash your heart from wickedness, that you may be saved. How long shall your evil thoughts lodge within you?

name: Jeremiah 4:15
text: For a voice declares from Dan, and publishes evil from the hills of Ephraim:

name: Jeremiah 4:16
text: "Tell the nations; behold, publish against Jerusalem, "Watchers come from a far country, and raise their voice against the cities of Judah.

name: Jeremiah 4:17
text: As keepers of a field, they are against her all around, because she has been rebellious against me,"" says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 4:18
text: "Your way and your doings have brought these things to you. This is your wickedness; for it is bitter, for it reaches to your heart."

name: Jeremiah 4:19
text: My anguish, my anguish! I am pained at my very heart; my heart is disquieted in me; I can"t hold my peace; because you have heard, O my soul, the sound of the trumpet, the alarm of war.

name: Jeremiah 4:20
text: Destruction on destruction is cried; for the whole land is laid waste: suddenly are my tents destroyed, and my curtains in a moment.

name: Jeremiah 4:21
text: How long shall I see the standard, and hear the sound of the trumpet?

name: Jeremiah 4:22
text: "For my people are foolish, they don"t know me. They are foolish children, and they have no understanding. They are skillful in doing evil, but to do good they have no knowledge."

name: Jeremiah 4:23
text: I saw the earth, and, behold, it was waste and void; and the heavens, and they had no light.

name: Jeremiah 4:24
text: I saw the mountains, and behold, they trembled, and all the hills moved back and forth.

name: Jeremiah 4:25
text: I saw, and behold, there was no man, and all the birds of the sky had fled.

name: Jeremiah 4:26
text: I saw, and behold, the fruitful field was a wilderness, and all its cities were broken down at the presence of Yahweh, before his fierce anger.

name: Jeremiah 4:27
text: For thus says Yahweh, "The whole land shall be a desolation; yet will I not make a full end.

name: Jeremiah 4:28
text: For this the earth will mourn, and the heavens above be black; because I have spoken it, I have purposed it, and I have not repented, neither will I turn back from it."

name: Jeremiah 4:29
text: Every city flees for the noise of the horsemen and archers; they go into the thickets, and climb up on the rocks: every city is forsaken, and not a man dwells therein.

name: Jeremiah 4:30
text: You, when you are made desolate, what will you do? Though you clothe yourself with scarlet, though you deck you with ornaments of gold, though you enlarge your eyes with paint, in vain do you make yourself beautiful; your lovers despise you, they seek your life.

name: Jeremiah 4:31
text: For I have heard a voice as of a woman in travail, the anguish as of her who brings forth her first child, the voice of the daughter of Zion, who gasps for breath, who spreads her hands, saying, "Woe is me now! For my soul faints before the murderers."

name: Jeremiah 5:1
text: "Run back and forth through the streets of Jerusalem, and see now, and know, and seek in the broad places of it, if you can find a man, if there are any who does justly, who seeks truth; and I will pardon her.

name: Jeremiah 5:2
text: Though they say, "As Yahweh lives;" surely they swear falsely."

name: Jeremiah 5:3
text: O Yahweh, don"t your eyes look on truth? You have stricken them, but they were not grieved. You have consumed them, but they have refused to receive correction. They have made their faces harder than a rock. They have refused to return.

name: Jeremiah 5:4
text: Then I said, "Surely these are poor. They are foolish; for they don"t know the way of Yahweh, nor the law of their God.

name: Jeremiah 5:5
text: I will go to the great men, and will speak to them; for they know the way of Yahweh, and the law of their God." But these with one accord have broken the yoke, and burst the bonds.

name: Jeremiah 5:6
text: Therefore a lion out of the forest shall kill them, a wolf of the evenings shall destroy them, a leopard shall watch against their cities; everyone who goes out there shall be torn in pieces; because their transgressions are many, and their backsliding is increased.

name: Jeremiah 5:7
text: "How can I pardon you? Your children have forsaken me, and sworn by what are no gods. When I had fed them to the full, they committed adultery, and assembled themselves in troops at the prostitutes" houses.

name: Jeremiah 5:8
text: They were as fed horses roaming at large: everyone neighed after his neighbor"s wife.

name: Jeremiah 5:9
text: Shouldn"t I punish them for these things?" says Yahweh; "and shouldn"t my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?

name: Jeremiah 5:10
text: "Go up on her walls, and destroy; but don"t make a full end. Take away her branches; for they are not Yahweh"s.

name: Jeremiah 5:11
text: For the house of Israel and the house of Judah have dealt very treacherously against me," says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 5:12
text: They have denied Yahweh, and said, "It is not he; neither shall evil come on us; neither shall we see sword nor famine.

name: Jeremiah 5:13
text: The prophets shall become wind, and the word is not in them. Thus shall it be done to them."

name: Jeremiah 5:14
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh, the God of Armies, "Because you speak this word, behold, I will make my words in your mouth fire, and this people wood, and it shall devour them.

name: Jeremiah 5:15
text: Behold, I will bring a nation on you from far, house of Israel," says Yahweh. "It is a mighty nation. It is an ancient nation, a nation whose language you don"t know, neither understand what they say.

name: Jeremiah 5:16
text: Their quiver is an open tomb, they are all mighty men.

name: Jeremiah 5:17
text: They shall eat up your harvest, and your bread, which your sons and your daughters should eat. They shall eat up your flocks and your herds. They shall eat up your vines and your fig trees. They shall beat down your fortified cities, in which you trust, with the sword.

name: Jeremiah 5:18
text: "But even in those days," says Yahweh, "I will not make a full end with you.

name: Jeremiah 5:19
text: It will happen, when you say, "Why has Yahweh our God done all these things to us?" Then you shall say to them, "Just like you have forsaken me, and served foreign gods in your land, so you shall serve strangers in a land that is not yours."

name: Jeremiah 5:20
text: "Declare this in the house of Jacob, and publish it in Judah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 5:21
text: "Hear now this, foolish people, and without understanding; who have eyes, and don"t see; who have ears, and don"t hear:

name: Jeremiah 5:22
text: Don"t you fear me?" says Yahweh "Won"t you tremble at my presence, who have placed the sand for the bound of the sea, by a perpetual decree, that it can"t pass it? and though its waves toss themselves, yet they can"t prevail; though they roar, yet they can"t pass over it."

name: Jeremiah 5:23
text: "But this people has a revolting and a rebellious heart; they have revolted and gone.

name: Jeremiah 5:24
text: Neither do they say in their heart, "Let us now fear Yahweh our God, who gives rain, both the former and the latter, in its season; who preserves to us the appointed weeks of the harvest."

name: Jeremiah 5:25
text: "Your iniquities have turned away these things, and your sins have withheld good from you.

name: Jeremiah 5:26
text: For among my people are found wicked men. They watch, as fowlers lie in wait. They set a trap. They catch men.

name: Jeremiah 5:27
text: As a cage is full of birds, so are their houses full of deceit. Therefore they have become great, and grew rich.

name: Jeremiah 5:28
text: They have grown fat. They shine; yes, they excell in deeds of wickedness. They don"t plead the cause, the cause of the fatherless, that they may prosper; and they don"t judge the right of the needy.

name: Jeremiah 5:29
text: "Shall I not punish for these things?" says Yahweh. "Shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?

name: Jeremiah 5:30
text: "An astonishing and horrible thing has happened in the land.

name: Jeremiah 5:31
text: The prophets prophesy falsely, and the priests rule by their own authority; and my people love to have it so. What will you do in the end of it?

name: Jeremiah 6:1
text: "Flee for safety, you children of Benjamin, out of the midst of Jerusalem, and blow the trumpet in Tekoa, and raise up a signal on Beth Haccherem; for evil looks forth from the north, and a great destruction.

name: Jeremiah 6:2
text: The comely and delicate one, the daughter of Zion, will I cut off.

name: Jeremiah 6:3
text: Shepherds with their flocks shall come to her; they shall pitch their tents against her all around; they shall feed everyone in his place."

name: Jeremiah 6:4
text: "Prepare war against her; arise, and let us go up at noon. Woe to us! For the day declines, for the shadows of the evening are stretched out.

name: Jeremiah 6:5
text: Arise, and let us go up by night, and let us destroy her palaces."

name: Jeremiah 6:6
text: For Yahweh of Armies said, "Cut down trees, and cast up a mound against Jerusalem: this is the city to be visited; she is wholly oppression in the midst of her.

name: Jeremiah 6:7
text: As a well casts forth its waters, so she casts forth her wickedness: violence and destruction is heard in her; before me continually is sickness and wounds.

name: Jeremiah 6:8
text: Be instructed, Jerusalem, lest my soul be alienated from you; lest I make you a desolation, a land not inhabited."

name: Jeremiah 6:9
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, "They shall thoroughly glean the remnant of Israel like a vine. Turn again your hand as a grape gatherer into the baskets."

name: Jeremiah 6:10
text: To whom shall I speak and testify, that they may hear? Behold, their ear is uncircumcised, and they can"t listen. Behold, the word of Yahweh has become a reproach to them. They have no delight in it.

name: Jeremiah 6:11
text: Therefore I am full of the wrath of Yahweh. I am weary with holding in. "Pour it out on the children in the street, and on the assembly of young men together; for even the husband with the wife shall be taken, the aged with him who is full of days.

name: Jeremiah 6:12
text: Their houses shall be turned to others, their fields and their wives together; for I will stretch out my hand on the inhabitants of the land, says Yahweh."

name: Jeremiah 6:13
text: "For from their least even to their greatest, everyone is given to covetousness; and from the prophet even to the priest, everyone deals falsely.

name: Jeremiah 6:14
text: They have healed also the hurt of my people superficially, saying, "Peace, peace!" when there is no peace.

name: Jeremiah 6:15
text: Were they ashamed when they had committed abomination? No, they were not at all ashamed, neither could they blush. Therefore they shall fall among those who fall; at the time that I visit them, they shall be cast down," says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 6:16
text: Thus says Yahweh, "Stand in the ways and see, and ask for the old paths, "Where is the good way?" and walk in it, and you will find rest for your souls. But they said, "We will not walk in it."

name: Jeremiah 6:17
text: I set watchmen over you, saying, "Listen to the sound of the trumpet!" But they said, "We will not listen!"

name: Jeremiah 6:18
text: Therefore hear, you nations, and know, congregation, what is among them.

name: Jeremiah 6:19
text: Hear, earth! Behold, I will bring evil on this people, even the fruit of their thoughts, because they have not listened to my words; and as for my law, they have rejected it.

name: Jeremiah 6:20
text: To what purpose comes there to me frankincense from Sheba, and the sweet cane from a far country? your burnt offerings are not acceptable, nor your sacrifices pleasing to me."

name: Jeremiah 6:21
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh, "Behold, I will lay stumbling blocks before this people. The fathers and the sons together shall stumble against them. The neighbor and his friend shall perish."

name: Jeremiah 6:22
text: Thus says Yahweh, "Behold, a people comes from the north country. A great nation shall be stirred up from the uttermost parts of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 6:23
text: They take hold of bow and spear. They are cruel, and have no mercy. Their voice roars like the sea, and they ride on horses, everyone set in array, as a man to the battle, against you, daughter of Zion."

name: Jeremiah 6:24
text: We have heard its report; our hands become feeble: anguish has taken hold of us, and pains as of a woman in labor.

name: Jeremiah 6:25
text: Don"t go forth into the field, nor walk by the way; for the sword of the enemy and terror, are on every side.

name: Jeremiah 6:26
text: Daughter of my people, clothe yourself with sackcloth, and wallow in ashes! Mourn, as for an only son, most bitter lamentation; for the destroyer shall suddenly come on us.

name: Jeremiah 6:27
text: "I have made you a tester of metals and a fortress among my people; that you may know and try their way.

name: Jeremiah 6:28
text: They are all grievous rebels, going about with slanders; they are brass and iron: they all of them deal corruptly.

name: Jeremiah 6:29
text: The bellows blow fiercely; the lead is consumed of the fire: in vain do they go on refining; for the wicked are not plucked away.

name: Jeremiah 6:30
text: Men will call them rejected silver, because Yahweh has rejected them."

name: Jeremiah 7:1
text: The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 7:2
text: "Stand in the gate of Yahweh"s house, and proclaim there this word, and say, "Hear the word of Yahweh, all you of Judah, who enter in at these gates to worship Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 7:3
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, Amend your ways and your doings, and I will cause you to dwell in this place.

name: Jeremiah 7:4
text: Don"t trust in lying words, saying, The temple of Yahweh, the temple of Yahweh, the temple of Yahweh, are these.

name: Jeremiah 7:5
text: For if you thoroughly amend your ways and your doings; if you thoroughly execute justice between a man and his neighbor;

name: Jeremiah 7:6
text: if you don"t oppress the foreigner, the fatherless, and the widow, and don"t shed innocent blood in this place, neither walk after other gods to your own hurt:

name: Jeremiah 7:7
text: then will I cause you to dwell in this place, in the land that I gave to your fathers, from of old even forevermore.

name: Jeremiah 7:8
text: Behold, you trust in lying words, that can"t profit.

name: Jeremiah 7:9
text: Will you steal, murder, and commit adultery, and swear falsely, and burn incense to Baal, and walk after other gods that you have not known,

name: Jeremiah 7:10
text: and come and stand before me in this house, which is called by my name, and say, We are delivered; that you may do all these abominations?

name: Jeremiah 7:11
text: Is this house, which is called by my name, become a den of robbers in your eyes? Behold, I, even I, have seen it, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 7:12
text: But go now to my place which was in Shiloh, where I caused my name to dwell at the first, and see what I did to it for the wickedness of my people Israel.

name: Jeremiah 7:13
text: Now, because you have done all these works, says Yahweh, and I spoke to you, rising up early and speaking, but you didn"t hear; and I called you, but you didn"t answer:

name: Jeremiah 7:14
text: therefore will I do to the house which is called by my name, in which you trust, and to the place which I gave to you and to your fathers, as I did to Shiloh.

name: Jeremiah 7:15
text: I will cast you out of my sight, as I have cast out all your brothers, even the whole seed of Ephraim.

name: Jeremiah 7:16
text: Therefore don"t pray for this people, neither lift up a cry nor prayer for them, neither make intercession to me; for I will not hear you.

name: Jeremiah 7:17
text: Don"t you see what they do in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem?

name: Jeremiah 7:18
text: The children gather wood, and the fathers kindle the fire, and the women knead the dough, to make cakes to the queen of the sky, and to pour out drink offerings to other gods, that they may provoke me to anger.

name: Jeremiah 7:19
text: Do they provoke me to anger? says Yahweh. Don"t they provoke themselves, to the confusion of their own faces?

name: Jeremiah 7:20
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, my anger and my wrath shall be poured out on this place, on man, and on animal, and on the trees of the field, and on the fruit of the ground; and it shall burn, and shall not be quenched.

name: Jeremiah 7:21
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Add your burnt offerings to your sacrifices, and eat meat.

name: Jeremiah 7:22
text: For I didn"t speak to your fathers, nor command them in the day that I brought them out of the land of Egypt, concerning burnt offerings or sacrifices:

name: Jeremiah 7:23
text: but this thing I commanded them, saying, Listen to my voice, and I will be your God, and you shall be my people; and walk in all the way that I command you, that it may be well with you.

name: Jeremiah 7:24
text: But they didn"t listen nor turn their ear, but walked in their own counsels and in the stubbornness of their evil heart, and went backward, and not forward.

name: Jeremiah 7:25
text: Since the day that your fathers came forth out of the land of Egypt to this day, I have sent to you all my servants the prophets, daily rising up early and sending them:

name: Jeremiah 7:26
text: yet they didn"t listen to me, nor inclined their ear, but made their neck stiff: they did worse than their fathers.

name: Jeremiah 7:27
text: You shall speak all these words to them; but they will not listen to you: you shall also call to them; but they will not answer you.

name: Jeremiah 7:28
text: You shall tell them, This is the nation that has not listened to the voice of Yahweh their God, nor received instruction: truth is perished, and is cut off from their mouth.

name: Jeremiah 7:29
text: Cut off your hair, and throw it away, and take up a lamentation on the bare heights; for Yahweh has rejected and forsaken the generation of his wrath.

name: Jeremiah 7:30
text: For the children of Judah have done that which is evil in my sight, says Yahweh: they have set their abominations in the house which is called by my name, to defile it.

name: Jeremiah 7:31
text: They have built the high places of Topheth, which is in the valley of the son of Hinnom, to burn their sons and their daughters in the fire; which I didn"t command, nor did it come into my mind.

name: Jeremiah 7:32
text: Therefore, behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that it shall no more be called Topheth, nor The valley of the son of Hinnom, but The valley of Slaughter: for they shall bury in Topheth, until there is no place to bury.

name: Jeremiah 7:33
text: The dead bodies of this people shall be food for the birds of the sky, and for the animals of the earth; and none shall frighten them away.

name: Jeremiah 7:34
text: Then will I cause to cease from the cities of Judah, and from the streets of Jerusalem, the voice of mirth and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom and the voice of the bride; for the land shall become a waste.

name: Jeremiah 8:1
text: At that time, says Yahweh, they shall bring out the bones of the kings of Judah, and the bones of his princes, and the bones of the priests, and the bones of the prophets, and the bones of the inhabitants of Jerusalem, out of their graves;

name: Jeremiah 8:2
text: and they shall spread them before the sun, and the moon, and all the army of the sky, which they have loved, and which they have served, and after which they have walked, and which they have sought, and which they have worshiped: they shall not be gathered, nor be buried, they shall be for dung on the surface of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 8:3
text: Death shall be chosen rather than life by all the residue that remain of this evil family, that remain in all the places where I have driven them, says Yahweh of Armies.

name: Jeremiah 8:4
text: Moreover you shall tell them, Thus says Yahweh: Shall men fall, and not rise up again? Shall one turn away, and not return?

name: Jeremiah 8:5
text: Why then is this people of Jerusalem slidden back by a perpetual backsliding? they hold fast deceit, they refuse to return.

name: Jeremiah 8:6
text: I listened and heard, but they didn"t speak aright: no man repents him of his wickedness, saying, What have I done? everyone turns to his course, as a horse that rushes headlong in the battle.

name: Jeremiah 8:7
text: Yes, the stork in the sky knows her appointed times; and the turtledove and the swallow and the crane observe the time of their coming; but my people don"t know Yahweh"s law.

name: Jeremiah 8:8
text: How do you say, We are wise, and the law of Yahweh is with us? But, behold, the false pen of the scribes has worked falsely.

name: Jeremiah 8:9
text: The wise men are disappointed, they are dismayed and taken: behold, they have rejected the word of Yahweh; and what kind of wisdom is in them?

name: Jeremiah 8:10
text: Therefore will I give their wives to others, and their fields to those who shall possess them: for everyone from the least even to the greatest is given to covetousness; from the prophet even to the priest every one deals falsely.

name: Jeremiah 8:11
text: They have healed the hurt of the daughter of my people slightly, saying, Peace, peace; when there is no peace.

name: Jeremiah 8:12
text: Were they ashamed when they had committed abomination? nay, they were not at all ashamed, neither could they blush: therefore shall they fall among those who fall; in the time of their visitation they shall be cast down, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 8:13
text: I will utterly consume them, says Yahweh: no grapes shall be on the vine, nor figs on the fig tree, and the leaf shall fade; and the things that I have given them shall pass away from them.

name: Jeremiah 8:14
text: Why do we sit still? Assemble yourselves, and let us enter into the fortified cities, and let us be silent there; for Yahweh our God has put us to silence, and given us water of gall to drink, because we have sinned against Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 8:15
text: We looked for peace, but no good came; and for a time of healing, and behold, dismay!

name: Jeremiah 8:16
text: The snorting of his horses is heard from Dan: at the sound of the neighing of his strong ones the whole land trembles; for they have come, and have devoured the land and all that is in it; the city and those who dwell therein.

name: Jeremiah 8:17
text: For, behold, I will send serpents, adders, among you, which will not be charmed; and they shall bite you, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 8:18
text: Oh that I could comfort myself against sorrow! My heart is faint within me.

name: Jeremiah 8:19
text: Behold, the voice of the cry of the daughter of my people from a land that is very far off: isn"t Yahweh in Zion? Isn"t her King in her? Why have they provoked me to anger with their engraved images, and with foreign vanities?

name: Jeremiah 8:20
text: The harvest is past, the summer is ended, and we are not saved.

name: Jeremiah 8:21
text: For the hurt of the daughter of my people am I hurt: I mourn; dismay has taken hold on me.

name: Jeremiah 8:22
text: Is there no balm in Gilead? is there no physician there? why then isn"t the health of the daughter of my people recovered?

name: Jeremiah 9:1
text: Oh that my head were waters, and my eyes a spring of tears, that I might weep day and night for the slain of the daughter of my people!

name: Jeremiah 9:2
text: Oh that I had in the wilderness a lodging place of wayfaring men; that I might leave my people, and go from them! for they are all adulterers, an assembly of treacherous men.

name: Jeremiah 9:3
text: They bend their tongue, as their bow, for falsehood; and they are grown strong in the land, but not for truth: for they proceed from evil to evil, and they don"t know me, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 9:4
text: Take heed everyone of his neighbor, and don"t trust in any brother; for every brother will utterly supplant, and every neighbor will go about with slanders.

name: Jeremiah 9:5
text: They will deceive everyone his neighbor, and will not speak the truth: they have taught their tongue to speak lies; they weary themselves to commit iniquity.

name: Jeremiah 9:6
text: Your habitation is in the midst of deceit; through deceit they refuse to know me, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 9:7
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh of Armies, Behold, I will melt them, and try them; for how should I deal with the daughter of my people?

name: Jeremiah 9:8
text: Their tongue is a deadly arrow; it speaks deceit: one speaks peaceably to his neighbor with his mouth, but in his heart he lays wait for him.

name: Jeremiah 9:9
text: Shall I not visit them for these things? says Yahweh; shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?

name: Jeremiah 9:10
text: For the mountains will I take up a weeping and wailing, and for the pastures of the wilderness a lamentation, because they are burned up, so that none passes through; neither can men hear the voice of the livestock; both the birds of the sky and the animals are fled, they are gone.

name: Jeremiah 9:11
text: I will make Jerusalem heaps, a dwelling place of jackals; and I will make the cities of Judah a desolation, without inhabitant.

name: Jeremiah 9:12
text: Who is the wise man, that may understand this? Who is he to whom the mouth of Yahweh has spoken, that he may declare it? Why is the land perished and burned up like a wilderness, so that none passes through?

name: Jeremiah 9:13
text: Yahweh says, Because they have forsaken my law which I set before them, and have not obeyed my voice, neither walked therein,

name: Jeremiah 9:14
text: but have walked after the stubbornness of their own heart, and after the Baals, which their fathers taught them;

name: Jeremiah 9:15
text: therefore thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, Behold, I will feed them, even this people, with wormwood, and give them water of gall to drink.

name: Jeremiah 9:16
text: I will scatter them also among the nations, whom neither they nor their fathers have known; and I will send the sword after them, until I have consumed them.

name: Jeremiah 9:17
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, Consider, and call for the mourning women, that they may come; and send for the skillful women, that they may come:

name: Jeremiah 9:18
text: and let them make haste, and take up a wailing for us, that our eyes may run down with tears, and our eyelids gush out with waters.

name: Jeremiah 9:19
text: For a voice of wailing is heard out of Zion, How are we ruined! we are greatly confounded, because we have forsaken the land, because they have cast down our dwellings.

name: Jeremiah 9:20
text: Yet hear the word of Yahweh, you women, and let your ear receive the word of his mouth; and teach your daughters wailing, and everyone her neighbor lamentation.

name: Jeremiah 9:21
text: For death has come up into our windows, it is entered into our palaces; to cut off the children from outside, and the young men from the streets.

name: Jeremiah 9:22
text: Speak, Thus says Yahweh, The dead bodies of men shall fall as dung on the open field, and as the handful after the harvester; and none shall gather them.

name: Jeremiah 9:23
text: Thus says Yahweh, Don"t let the wise man glory in his wisdom, neither let the mighty man glory in his might, don"t let the rich man glory in his riches;

name: Jeremiah 9:24
text: but let him who glories glory in this, that he has understanding, and knows me, that I am Yahweh who exercises loving kindness, justice, and righteousness, in the earth: for in these things I delight, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 9:25
text: Behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that I will punish all those who are circumcised in uncircumcision:

name: Jeremiah 9:26
text: Egypt, and Judah, and Edom, and the children of Ammon, and Moab, and all that have the corners of their hair cut off, who dwell in the wilderness; for all the nations are uncircumcised, and all the house of Israel are uncircumcised in heart.

name: Jeremiah 10:1
text: Hear the word which Yahweh speaks to you, house of Israel!

name: Jeremiah 10:2
text: Thus says Yahweh, "Don"t learn the way of the nations, and don"t be dismayed at the signs of the sky; for the nations are dismayed at them.

name: Jeremiah 10:3
text: For the customs of the peoples are vanity; for one cuts a tree out of the forest, the work of the hands of the workman with the axe.

name: Jeremiah 10:4
text: They deck it with silver and with gold; they fasten it with nails and with hammers, that it not move.

name: Jeremiah 10:5
text: They are like a palm tree, of turned work, and don"t speak: they must be carried, because they can"t go. Don"t be afraid of them; for they can"t do evil, neither is it in them to do good."

name: Jeremiah 10:6
text: There is none like you, Yahweh; you are great, and your name is great in might.

name: Jeremiah 10:7
text: Who should not fear you, King of the nations? For it appertains to you; because among all the wise men of the nations, and in all their royal estate, there is none like you.

name: Jeremiah 10:8
text: But they are together brutish and foolish: the instruction of idols! it is but a stock.

name: Jeremiah 10:9
text: There is silver beaten into plates, which is brought from Tarshish, and gold from Uphaz, the work of the artificer and of the hands of the goldsmith; blue and purple for their clothing; they are all the work of skillful men.

name: Jeremiah 10:10
text: But Yahweh is the true God; he is the living God, and an everlasting King: at his wrath the earth trembles, and the nations are not able to withstand his indignation.

name: Jeremiah 10:11
text: You shall say this to them: The gods that have not made the heavens and the earth, these shall perish from the earth, and from under the heavens.

name: Jeremiah 10:12
text: He has made the earth by his power, he has established the world by his wisdom, and by his understanding has he stretched out the heavens:

name: Jeremiah 10:13
text: when he utters his voice, there is a tumult of waters in the heavens, and he causes the vapors to ascend from the ends of the earth; he makes lightnings for the rain, and brings forth the wind out of his treasuries.

name: Jeremiah 10:14
text: Every man has become brutish and without knowledge; every goldsmith is disappointed by his engraved image; for his molten image is falsehood, and there is no breath in them.

name: Jeremiah 10:15
text: They are vanity, a work of delusion: in the time of their visitation they shall perish.

name: Jeremiah 10:16
text: The portion of Jacob is not like these; for he is the former of all things; and Israel is the tribe of his inheritance: Yahweh of Armies is his name.

name: Jeremiah 10:17
text: Gather up your wares out of the land, you who live under siege.

name: Jeremiah 10:18
text: For thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will sling out the inhabitants of the land at this time, and will distress them, that they may feel it.

name: Jeremiah 10:19
text: Woe is me because of my hurt! my wound is grievous: but I said, Truly this is my grief, and I must bear it.

name: Jeremiah 10:20
text: My tent is destroyed, and all my cords are broken: my children are gone forth from me, and they are no more: there is none to spread my tent any more, and to set up my curtains.

name: Jeremiah 10:21
text: For the shepherds are become brutish, and have not inquired of Yahweh: therefore they have not prospered, and all their flocks are scattered.

name: Jeremiah 10:22
text: The voice of news, behold, it comes, and a great commotion out of the north country, to make the cities of Judah a desolation, a dwelling place of jackals.

name: Jeremiah 10:23
text: Yahweh, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man who walks to direct his steps.

name: Jeremiah 10:24
text: Yahweh, correct me, but in measure: not in your anger, lest you bring me to nothing.

name: Jeremiah 10:25
text: Pour out your wrath on the nations that don"t know you, and on the families that don"t call on your name: for they have devoured Jacob, yes, they have devoured him and consumed him, and have laid waste his habitation.

name: Jeremiah 11:1
text: The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 11:2
text: Hear the words of this covenant, and speak to the men of Judah, and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem;

name: Jeremiah 11:3
text: and say to them, Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel: Cursed is the man who doesn"t hear the words of this covenant,

name: Jeremiah 11:4
text: which I commanded your fathers in the day that I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, out of the iron furnace, saying, Obey my voice, and do them, according to all which I command you: so you shall be my people, and I will be your God;

name: Jeremiah 11:5
text: that I may establish the oath which I swore to your fathers, to give them a land flowing with milk and honey, as at this day. Then answered I, and said, Amen, Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 11:6
text: Yahweh said to me, Proclaim all these words in the cities of Judah, and in the streets of Jerusalem, saying, Hear the words of this covenant, and do them.

name: Jeremiah 11:7
text: For I earnestly protested to your fathers in the day that I brought them up out of the land of Egypt, even to this day, rising early and protesting, saying, Obey my voice.

name: Jeremiah 11:8
text: Yet they didn"t obey, nor turn their ear, but walked everyone in the stubbornness of their evil heart: therefore I brought on them all the words of this covenant, which I commanded them to do, but they didn"t do them.

name: Jeremiah 11:9
text: Yahweh said to me, A conspiracy is found among the men of Judah, and among the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 11:10
text: They are turned back to the iniquities of their forefathers, who refused to hear my words; and they are gone after other gods to serve them: the house of Israel and the house of Judah have broken my covenant which I made with their fathers.

name: Jeremiah 11:11
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will bring evil on them, which they shall not be able to escape; and they shall cry to me, but I will not listen to them.

name: Jeremiah 11:12
text: Then shall the cities of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem go and cry to the gods to which they offer incense: but they will not save them at all in the time of their trouble.

name: Jeremiah 11:13
text: For according to the number of your cities are your gods, Judah; and according to the number of the streets of Jerusalem have you set up altars to the shameful thing, even altars to burn incense to Baal.

name: Jeremiah 11:14
text: Therefore don"t pray for this people, neither lift up cry nor prayer for them; for I will not hear them in the time that they cry to me because of their trouble.

name: Jeremiah 11:15
text: What has my beloved to do in my house, since she has worked lewdness with many, and the holy flesh is passed from you? when you do evil, then you rejoice.

name: Jeremiah 11:16
text: Yahweh called your name, A green olive tree, beautiful with goodly fruit: with the noise of a great tumult he has kindled fire on it, and its branches are broken.

name: Jeremiah 11:17
text: For Yahweh of Armies, who planted you, has pronounced evil against you, because of the evil of the house of Israel and of the house of Judah, which they have worked for themselves in provoking me to anger by offering incense to Baal.

name: Jeremiah 11:18
text: Yahweh gave me knowledge of it, and I knew it: then you showed me their doings.

name: Jeremiah 11:19
text: But I was like a gentle lamb that is led to the slaughter; and I didn"t know that they had devised devices against me, saying, Let us destroy the tree with its fruit, and let us cut him off from the land of the living, that his name may be no more remembered.

name: Jeremiah 11:20
text: But, Yahweh of Armies, who judges righteously, who tests the heart and the mind, I shall see your vengeance on them; for to you have I revealed my cause.

name: Jeremiah 11:21
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh concerning the men of Anathoth, who seek your life, saying, You shall not prophesy in the name of Yahweh, that you not die by our hand;

name: Jeremiah 11:22
text: therefore thus says Yahweh of Armies, Behold, I will punish them: the young men shall die by the sword; their sons and their daughters shall die by famine;

name: Jeremiah 11:23
text: and there shall be no remnant to them: for I will bring evil on the men of Anathoth, even the year of their visitation.

name: Jeremiah 12:1
text: You are righteous, Yahweh, when I contend with you; yet I would reason the cause with you: why does the way of the wicked prosper? why are all they at ease who deal very treacherously?

name: Jeremiah 12:2
text: You have planted them, yes, they have taken root; they grow, yes, they bring forth fruit: you are near in their mouth, and far from their heart.

name: Jeremiah 12:3
text: But you, Yahweh, know me; you see me, and try my heart toward you: pull them out like sheep for the slaughter, and prepare them for the day of slaughter.

name: Jeremiah 12:4
text: How long shall the land mourn, and the herbs of the whole country wither? for the wickedness of those who dwell therein, the animals are consumed, and the birds; because they said, He shall not see our latter end.

name: Jeremiah 12:5
text: If you have run with the footmen, and they have wearied you, then how can you contend with horses? and though in a land of peace you are secure, yet how will you do in the pride of the Jordan?

name: Jeremiah 12:6
text: For even your brothers, and the house of your father, even they have dealt treacherously with you; even they have cried aloud after you: don"t believe them, though they speak beautiful words to you.

name: Jeremiah 12:7
text: I have forsaken my house, I have cast off my heritage; I have given the dearly beloved of my soul into the hand of her enemies.

name: Jeremiah 12:8
text: My heritage has become to me as a lion in the forest: she has uttered her voice against me; therefore I have hated her.

name: Jeremiah 12:9
text: Is my heritage to me as a speckled bird of prey? are the birds of prey against her all around? Go, assemble all the animals of the field, bring them to devour.

name: Jeremiah 12:10
text: Many shepherds have destroyed my vineyard, they have trodden my portion under foot, they have made my pleasant portion a desolate wilderness.

name: Jeremiah 12:11
text: They have made it a desolation; it mourns to me, being desolate; the whole land is made desolate, because no man lays it to heart.

name: Jeremiah 12:12
text: Destroyers have come on all the bare heights in the wilderness; for the sword of Yahweh devours from the one end of the land even to the other end of the land: no flesh has peace.

name: Jeremiah 12:13
text: They have sown wheat, and have reaped thorns; they have put themselves to pain, and profit nothing: and you shall be ashamed of your fruits, because of the fierce anger of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 12:14
text: Thus says Yahweh against all my evil neighbors, who touch the inheritance which I have caused my people Israel to inherit: behold, I will pluck them up from off their land, and will pluck up the house of Judah from among them.

name: Jeremiah 12:15
text: It shall happen, after that I have plucked them up, I will return and have compassion on them; and I will bring them again, every man to his heritage, and every man to his land.

name: Jeremiah 12:16
text: It shall happen, if they will diligently learn the ways of my people, to swear by my name, As Yahweh lives; even as they taught my people to swear by Baal; then shall they be built up in the midst of my people.

name: Jeremiah 12:17
text: But if they will not hear, then will I pluck up that nation, plucking up and destroying it, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 13:1
text: Thus says Yahweh to me, Go, and buy yourself a linen belt, and put it on your waist, and don"t put it in water.

name: Jeremiah 13:2
text: So I bought a belt according to the word of Yahweh, and put it on my waist.

name: Jeremiah 13:3
text: The word of Yahweh came to me the second time, saying,

name: Jeremiah 13:4
text: Take the belt that you have bought, which is on your waist, and arise, go to the Euphrates, and hide it there in a cleft of the rock.

name: Jeremiah 13:5
text: So I went, and hid it by the Euphrates, as Yahweh commanded me.

name: Jeremiah 13:6
text: It happened after many days, that Yahweh said to me, Arise, go to the Euphrates, and take the belt from there, which I commanded you to hide there.

name: Jeremiah 13:7
text: Then I went to the Euphrates, and dug, and took the belt from the place where I had hidden it; and behold, the belt was marred, it was profitable for nothing.

name: Jeremiah 13:8
text: Then the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Jeremiah 13:9
text: Thus says Yahweh, In this way I will mar the pride of Judah, and the great pride of Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 13:10
text: This evil people, who refuse to hear my words, who walk in the stubbornness of their heart, and are gone after other gods to serve them, and to worship them, shall even be as this belt, which is profitable for nothing.

name: Jeremiah 13:11
text: For as the belt clings to the waist of a man, so have I caused to cling to me the whole house of Israel and the whole house of Judah, says Yahweh; that they may be to me for a people, and for a name, and for a praise, and for a glory: but they would not hear.

name: Jeremiah 13:12
text: Therefore you shall speak to them this word: Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, Every bottle shall be filled with wine: and they shall tell you, Do we not certainly know that every bottle shall be filled with wine?

name: Jeremiah 13:13
text: Then you shall tell them, Thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will fill all the inhabitants of this land, even the kings who sit on David"s throne, and the priests, and the prophets, and all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, with drunkenness.

name: Jeremiah 13:14
text: I will dash them one against another, even the fathers and the sons together, says Yahweh: I will not pity, nor spare, nor have compassion, that I should not destroy them.

name: Jeremiah 13:15
text: Hear, and give ear; don"t be proud; for Yahweh has spoken.

name: Jeremiah 13:16
text: Give glory to Yahweh your God, before he causes darkness, and before your feet stumble on the dark mountains, and, while you look for light, he turns it into the shadow of death, and makes it gross darkness.

name: Jeremiah 13:17
text: But if you will not hear it, my soul shall weep in secret for your pride; and my eye shall weep bitterly, and run down with tears, because Yahweh"s flock is taken captive.

name: Jeremiah 13:18
text: Say to the king and to the queen mother, Humble yourselves, sit down; for your headdresses have come down, even the crown of your glory.

name: Jeremiah 13:19
text: The cities of the South are shut up, and there is none to open them: Judah is carried away captive, all of it; it is wholly carried away captive.

name: Jeremiah 13:20
text: Lift up your eyes, and see those who come from the north: where is the flock that was given you, your beautiful flock?

name: Jeremiah 13:21
text: What will you say, when he shall set over you as head those whom you have yourself taught to be friends to you? shall not sorrows take hold of you, as of a woman in travail?

name: Jeremiah 13:22
text: If you say in your heart, Why are these things come on me? for the greatness of your iniquity are your skirts uncovered, and your heels suffer violence.

name: Jeremiah 13:23
text: Can the Ethiopian change his skin, or the leopard his spots? then may you also do good, who are accustomed to do evil.

name: Jeremiah 13:24
text: Therefore will I scatter them, as the stubble that passes away, by the wind of the wilderness.

name: Jeremiah 13:25
text: This is your lot, the portion measured to you from me, says Yahweh; because you have forgotten me, and trusted in falsehood.

name: Jeremiah 13:26
text: Therefore will I also uncover your skirts on your face, and your shame shall appear.

name: Jeremiah 13:27
text: I have seen your abominations, even your adulteries, and your neighing, the lewdness of your prostitution, on the hills in the field. Woe to you, Jerusalem! You will not be made clean; how long shall it yet be?

name: Jeremiah 14:1
text: The word of Yahweh that came to Jeremiah concerning the drought.

name: Jeremiah 14:2
text: Judah mourns, and its gates languish, they sit in black on the ground; and the cry of Jerusalem is gone up.

name: Jeremiah 14:3
text: Their nobles send their little ones to the waters: they come to the cisterns, and find no water; they return with their vessels empty; they are disappointed and confounded, and cover their heads.

name: Jeremiah 14:4
text: Because of the ground which is cracked, because no rain has been in the land, the plowmen are disappointed, they cover their heads.

name: Jeremiah 14:5
text: Yes, the hind also in the field calves, and forsakes her young, because there is no grass.

name: Jeremiah 14:6
text: The wild donkeys stand on the bare heights, they pant for air like jackals; their eyes fail, because there is no herbage.

name: Jeremiah 14:7
text: Though our iniquities testify against us, work for your name"s sake, Yahweh; for our backslidings are many; we have sinned against you.

name: Jeremiah 14:8
text: You hope of Israel, its Savior in the time of trouble, why should you be as a foreigner in the land, and as a wayfaring man who turns aside to stay for a night?

name: Jeremiah 14:9
text: Why should you be like a scared man, as a mighty man who can"t save? Yet you, Yahweh, are in the midst of us, and we are called by your name; don"t leave us.

name: Jeremiah 14:10
text: Thus says Yahweh to this people, Even so have they loved to wander; they have not refrained their feet: therefore Yahweh does not accept them; now he will remember their iniquity, and visit their sins.

name: Jeremiah 14:11
text: Yahweh said to me, Don"t pray for this people for their good.

name: Jeremiah 14:12
text: When they fast, I will not hear their cry; and when they offer burnt offering and meal offering, I will not accept them; but I will consume them by the sword, and by the famine, and by the pestilence.

name: Jeremiah 14:13
text: Then I said, Ah, Lord Yahweh! behold, the prophets tell them, You shall not see the sword, neither shall you have famine; but I will give you assured peace in this place.

name: Jeremiah 14:14
text: Then Yahweh said to me, The prophets prophesy lies in my name; I didn"t send them, neither have I commanded them, neither spoke I to them: they prophesy to you a lying vision, and divination, and a thing of nothing, and the deceit of their own heart.

name: Jeremiah 14:15
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh concerning the prophets who prophesy in my name, and I didn"t send them, yet they say, Sword and famine shall not be in this land: By sword and famine shall those prophets be consumed.

name: Jeremiah 14:16
text: The people to whom they prophesy shall be cast out in the streets of Jerusalem because of the famine and the sword; and they shall have none to bury them"them, their wives, nor their sons, nor their daughters: for I will pour their wickedness on them.

name: Jeremiah 14:17
text: You shall say this word to them, Let my eyes run down with tears night and day, and let them not cease; for the virgin daughter of my people is broken with a great breach, with a very grievous wound.

name: Jeremiah 14:18
text: If I go forth into the field, then, behold, the slain with the sword! and if I enter into the city, then, behold, those who are sick with famine! for both the prophet and the priest go about in the land, and have no knowledge.

name: Jeremiah 14:19
text: Have you utterly rejected Judah? has your soul loathed Zion? why have you struck us, and there is no healing for us? We looked for peace, but no good came; and for a time of healing, and behold, dismay!

name: Jeremiah 14:20
text: We acknowledge, Yahweh, our wickedness, and the iniquity of our fathers; for we have sinned against you.

name: Jeremiah 14:21
text: Do not abhor us, for your name"s sake; do not disgrace the throne of your glory: remember, don"t break your covenant with us.

name: Jeremiah 14:22
text: Are there any among the vanities of the nations that can cause rain? or can the sky give showers? Aren"t you he, Yahweh our God? therefore we will wait for you; for you have made all these things.

name: Jeremiah 15:1
text: Then Yahweh said to me, Though Moses and Samuel stood before me, yet my mind would not be toward this people: cast them out of my sight, and let them go forth.

name: Jeremiah 15:2
text: It shall happen, when they tell you, Where shall we go forth? Then you shall tell them, Thus says Yahweh: Such as are for death, to death; and such as are for the sword, to the sword; and such as are for the famine, to the famine; and such as are for captivity, to captivity.

name: Jeremiah 15:3
text: I will appoint over them four kinds, says Yahweh: the sword to kill, and the dogs to tear, and the birds of the sky, and the animals of the earth, to devour and to destroy.

name: Jeremiah 15:4
text: I will cause them to be tossed back and forth among all the kingdoms of the earth, because of Manasseh, the son of Hezekiah, king of Judah, for that which he did in Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 15:5
text: For who will have pity on you, Jerusalem? or who will bemoan you? or who will turn aside to ask of your welfare?

name: Jeremiah 15:6
text: You have rejected me, says Yahweh, you have gone backward: therefore have I stretched out my hand against you, and destroyed you; I am weary with repenting.

name: Jeremiah 15:7
text: I have winnowed them with a fan in the gates of the land; I have bereaved them of children, I have destroyed my people; they didn"t return from their ways.

name: Jeremiah 15:8
text: Their widows are increased to me above the sand of the seas; I have brought on them against the mother of the young men a destroyer at noonday: I have caused anguish and terrors to fall on her suddenly.

name: Jeremiah 15:9
text: She who has borne seven languishes; she has given up the spirit; her sun is gone down while it was yet day; she has been disappointed and confounded: and their residue will I deliver to the sword before their enemies, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 15:10
text: Woe is me, my mother, that you have borne me a man of strife and a man of contention to the whole earth! I have not lent, neither have men lent to me; yet everyone of them curses me.

name: Jeremiah 15:11
text: Yahweh said, Most certainly I will strengthen you for good; most certainly I will cause the enemy to make supplication to you in the time of evil and in the time of affliction.

name: Jeremiah 15:12
text: Can one break iron, even iron from the north, and brass?

name: Jeremiah 15:13
text: Your substance and your treasures will I give for a spoil without price, and that for all your sins, even in all your borders.

name: Jeremiah 15:14
text: I will make them to pass with your enemies into a land which you don"t know; for a fire is kindled in my anger, which shall burn on you.

name: Jeremiah 15:15
text: Yahweh, you know; remember me, and visit me, and avenge me of my persecutors; don"t take me away in your longsuffering: know that for your sake I have suffered reproach.

name: Jeremiah 15:16
text: Your words were found, and I ate them; and your words were to me a joy and the rejoicing of my heart: for I am called by your name, Yahweh, God of Armies.

name: Jeremiah 15:17
text: I didn"t sit in the assembly of those who make merry, nor rejoiced; I sat alone because of your hand; for you have filled me with indignation.

name: Jeremiah 15:18
text: Why is my pain perpetual, and my wound incurable, which refuses to be healed? Will you indeed be to me as a deceitful brook, as waters that fail?

name: Jeremiah 15:19
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh, If you return, then will I bring you again, that you may stand before me; and if you take forth the precious from the vile, you shall be as my mouth: they shall return to you, but you shall not return to them.

name: Jeremiah 15:20
text: I will make you to this people a fortified bronze wall; and they shall fight against you, but they shall not prevail against you; for I am with you to save you and to deliver you, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 15:21
text: I will deliver you out of the hand of the wicked, and I will redeem you out of the hand of the terrible.

name: Jeremiah 16:1
text: The word of Yahweh came also to me, saying,

name: Jeremiah 16:2
text: You shall not take a wife, neither shall you have sons or daughters, in this place.

name: Jeremiah 16:3
text: For thus says Yahweh concerning the sons and concerning the daughters who are born in this place, and concerning their mothers who bore them, and concerning their fathers who became their father in this land:

name: Jeremiah 16:4
text: They shall die grievous deaths: they shall not be lamented, neither shall they be buried; they shall be as dung on the surface of the ground; and they shall be consumed by the sword, and by famine; and their dead bodies shall be food for the birds of the sky, and for the animals of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 16:5
text: For thus says Yahweh, Don"t enter into the house of mourning, neither go to lament, neither bemoan them; for I have taken away my peace from this people, says Yahweh, even loving kindness and tender mercies.

name: Jeremiah 16:6
text: Both great and small shall die in this land; they shall not be buried, neither shall men lament for them, nor cut themselves, nor make themselves bald for them;

name: Jeremiah 16:7
text: neither shall men break bread for them in mourning, to comfort them for the dead; neither shall men give them the cup of consolation to drink for their father or for their mother.

name: Jeremiah 16:8
text: You shall not go into the house of feasting to sit with them, to eat and to drink.

name: Jeremiah 16:9
text: For thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Behold, I will cause to cease out of this place, before your eyes and in your days, the voice of mirth and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom and the voice of the bride.

name: Jeremiah 16:10
text: It shall happen, when you shall show this people all these words, and they shall tell you, Why has Yahweh pronounced all this great evil against us? or what is our iniquity? or what is our sin that we have committed against Yahweh our God?

name: Jeremiah 16:11
text: Then you shall tell them, Because your fathers have forsaken me, says Yahweh, and have walked after other gods, and have served them, and have worshiped them, and have forsaken me, and have not kept my law;

name: Jeremiah 16:12
text: and you have done evil more than your fathers; for, behold, you walk every one after the stubbornness of his evil heart, so that you don"t listen to me:

name: Jeremiah 16:13
text: therefore will I cast you forth out of this land into the land that you have not known, neither you nor your fathers; and there you shall serve other gods day and night; for I will show you no favor.

name: Jeremiah 16:14
text: Therefore, behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that it shall no more be said, As Yahweh lives, who brought up the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt;

name: Jeremiah 16:15
text: but, As Yahweh lives, who brought up the children of Israel from the land of the north, and from all the countries where he had driven them. I will bring them again into their land that I gave to their fathers.

name: Jeremiah 16:16
text: Behold, I will send for many fishermen, says Yahweh, and they shall fish them up; and afterward I will send for many hunters, and they shall hunt them from every mountain, and from every hill, and out of the clefts of the rocks.

name: Jeremiah 16:17
text: For my eyes are on all their ways; they are not hidden from my face, neither is their iniquity concealed from my eyes.

name: Jeremiah 16:18
text: First I will recompense their iniquity and their sin double, because they have polluted my land with the carcasses of their detestable things, and have filled my inheritance with their abominations.

name: Jeremiah 16:19
text: Yahweh, my strength, and my stronghold, and my refuge in the day of affliction, to you shall the nations come from the ends of the earth, and shall say, Our fathers have inherited nothing but lies, vanity and things in which there is no profit.

name: Jeremiah 16:20
text: Shall a man make to himself gods, which yet are no gods?

name: Jeremiah 16:21
text: Therefore, behold, I will cause them to know, this once will I cause them to know my hand and my might; and they shall know that my name is Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 17:1
text: The sin of Judah is written with a pen of iron, and with the point of a diamond: it is engraved on the tablet of their heart, and on the horns of your altars;

name: Jeremiah 17:2
text: while their children remember their altars and their Asherim by the green trees on the high hills.

name: Jeremiah 17:3
text: My mountain in the field, I will give your substance and all your treasures for a spoil, and your high places, because of sin, throughout all your borders.

name: Jeremiah 17:4
text: You, even of yourself, shall discontinue from your heritage that I gave you; and I will cause you to serve your enemies in the land which you don"t know: for you have kindled a fire in my anger which shall burn forever.

name: Jeremiah 17:5
text: Thus says Yahweh: Cursed is the man who trusts in man, and makes flesh his arm, and whose heart departs from Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 17:6
text: For he shall be like the heath in the desert, and shall not see when good comes, but shall inhabit the parched places in the wilderness, a salt land and not inhabited.

name: Jeremiah 17:7
text: Blessed is the man who trusts in Yahweh, and whose trust Yahweh is.

name: Jeremiah 17:8
text: For he shall be as a tree planted by the waters, who spreads out its roots by the river, and shall not fear when heat comes, but its leaf shall be green; and shall not be careful in the year of drought, neither shall cease from yielding fruit.

name: Jeremiah 17:9
text: The heart is deceitful above all things, and it is exceedingly corrupt: who can know it?

name: Jeremiah 17:10
text: I, Yahweh, search the mind, I try the heart, even to give every man according to his ways, according to the fruit of his doings.

name: Jeremiah 17:11
text: As the partridge that sits on eggs which she has not laid, so is he who gets riches, and not by right; in the midst of his days they shall leave him, and at his end he shall be a fool.

name: Jeremiah 17:12
text: A glorious throne, set on high from the beginning, is the place of our sanctuary.

name: Jeremiah 17:13
text: Yahweh, the hope of Israel, all who forsake you shall be disappointed. Those who depart from me shall be written in the earth, because they have forsaken Yahweh, the spring of living waters.

name: Jeremiah 17:14
text: Heal me, O Yahweh, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved: for you are my praise.

name: Jeremiah 17:15
text: Behold, they tell me, Where is the word of Yahweh? let it come now.

name: Jeremiah 17:16
text: As for me, I have not hurried from being a shepherd after you; neither have I desired the woeful day; you know: that which came out of my lips was before your face.

name: Jeremiah 17:17
text: Don"t be a terror to me: you are my refuge in the day of evil.

name: Jeremiah 17:18
text: Let them be disappointed who persecute me, but let not me be disappointed; let them be dismayed, but don"t let me be dismayed; bring on them the day of evil, and destroy them with double destruction.

name: Jeremiah 17:19
text: Thus said Yahweh to me: Go, and stand in the gate of the children of the people, through which the kings of Judah come in, and by which they go out, and in all the gates of Jerusalem;

name: Jeremiah 17:20
text: and tell them, Hear the word of Yahweh, you kings of Judah, and all Judah, and all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, that enter in by these gates:

name: Jeremiah 17:21
text: Thus says Yahweh, Take heed to yourselves, and bear no burden on the Sabbath day, nor bring it in by the gates of Jerusalem;

name: Jeremiah 17:22
text: neither carry forth a burden out of your houses on the Sabbath day holy, neither do any work: but make the Sabbath day, as I commanded your fathers.

name: Jeremiah 17:23
text: But they didn"t listen, neither turn their ear, but made their neck stiff, that they might not hear, and might not receive instruction.

name: Jeremiah 17:24
text: It shall happen, if you diligently listen to me, says Yahweh, to bring in no burden through the gates of this city on the Sabbath day, but to make the Sabbath day holy, to do no work therein;

name: Jeremiah 17:25
text: then shall there enter in by the gates of this city kings and princes sitting on the throne of David, riding in chariots and on horses, they, and their princes, the men of Judah, and the inhabitants of Jerusalem; and this city shall remain forever.

name: Jeremiah 17:26
text: They shall come from the cities of Judah, and from the places around Jerusalem, and from the land of Benjamin, and from the lowland, and from the hill country, and from the South, bringing burnt offerings, and sacrifices, and meal offerings, and frankincense, and bringing sacrifices of thanksgiving, to the house of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 17:27
text: But if you will not listen to me to make the Sabbath day holy, and not to bear a burden and enter in at the gates of Jerusalem on the Sabbath day; then will I kindle a fire in its gates, and it shall devour the palaces of Jerusalem, and it shall not be quenched.

name: Jeremiah 18:1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 18:2
text: Arise, and go down to the potter"s house, and there I will cause you to hear my words.

name: Jeremiah 18:3
text: Then I went down to the potter"s house, and behold, he was making a work on the wheels.

name: Jeremiah 18:4
text: When the vessel that he made of the clay was marred in the hand of the potter, he made it again another vessel, as seemed good to the potter to make it.

name: Jeremiah 18:5
text: Then the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Jeremiah 18:6
text: House of Israel, can"t I do with you as this potter? says Yahweh. Behold, as the clay in the potter"s hand, so are you in my hand, house of Israel.

name: Jeremiah 18:7
text: At what instant I shall speak concerning a nation, and concerning a kingdom, to pluck up and to break down and to destroy it;

name: Jeremiah 18:8
text: if that nation, concerning which I have spoken, turn from their evil, I will repent of the evil that I thought to do to them.

name: Jeremiah 18:9
text: At what instant I shall speak concerning a nation, and concerning a kingdom, to build and to plant it;

name: Jeremiah 18:10
text: if they do that which is evil in my sight, that they not obey my voice, then I will repent of the good, with which I said I would benefit them.

name: Jeremiah 18:11
text: Now therefore, speak to the men of Judah, and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem, saying, Thus says Yahweh: Behold, I frame evil against you, and devise a device against you: return you now everyone from his evil way, and amend your ways and your doings.

name: Jeremiah 18:12
text: But they say, It is in vain; for we will walk after our own devices, and we will do everyone after the stubbornness of his evil heart.

name: Jeremiah 18:13
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh: Ask now among the nations, who has heard such things; the virgin of Israel has done a very horrible thing.

name: Jeremiah 18:14
text: Shall the snow of Lebanon fail from the rock of the field? Shall the cold waters that flow down from afar be dried up?

name: Jeremiah 18:15
text: For my people have forgotten me, they have burned incense to false gods; and they have been made to stumble in their ways, in the ancient paths, to walk in byways, in a way not built up;

name: Jeremiah 18:16
text: to make their land an astonishment, and a perpetual hissing; everyone who passes thereby shall be astonished, and shake his head.

name: Jeremiah 18:17
text: I will scatter them as with an east wind before the enemy; I will show them the back, and not the face, in the day of their calamity.

name: Jeremiah 18:18
text: Then they said, Come, and let us devise devices against Jeremiah; for the law shall not perish from the priest, nor counsel from the wise, nor the word from the prophet. Come, and let us strike him with the tongue, and let us not give heed to any of his words.

name: Jeremiah 18:19
text: Give heed to me, Yahweh, and listen to the voice of those who contend with me.

name: Jeremiah 18:20
text: Shall evil be recompensed for good? for they have dug a pit for my soul. Remember how I stood before you to speak good for them, to turn away your wrath from them.

name: Jeremiah 18:21
text: Therefore deliver up their children to the famine, and give them over to the power of the sword; and let their wives become childless, and widows; and let their men be slain of death, and their young men struck of the sword in battle.

name: Jeremiah 18:22
text: Let a cry be heard from their houses, when you shall bring a troop suddenly on them; for they have dug a pit to take me, and hid snares for my feet.

name: Jeremiah 18:23
text: Yet, Yahweh, you know all their counsel against me to kill me; don"t forgive their iniquity, neither blot out their sin from your sight; but let them be overthrown before you; deal you with them in the time of your anger.

name: Jeremiah 19:1
text: Thus said Yahweh, Go, and buy a potter"s earthen bottle, and take some of the elders of the people, and of the elders of the priests;

name: Jeremiah 19:2
text: and go forth to the valley of the son of Hinnom, which is by the entry of the gate Harsith, and proclaim there the words that I shall tell you;

name: Jeremiah 19:3
text: and say, Hear the word of Yahweh, kings of Judah, and inhabitants of Jerusalem: thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, Behold, I will bring evil on this place, which whoever hears, his ears shall tingle.

name: Jeremiah 19:4
text: Because they have forsaken me, and have estranged this place, and have burned incense in it to other gods, that they didn"t know, they and their fathers and the kings of Judah; and have filled this place with the blood of innocents,

name: Jeremiah 19:5
text: and have built the high places of Baal, to burn their sons in the fire for burnt offerings to Baal; which I didn"t command, nor spoke it, neither came it into my mind:

name: Jeremiah 19:6
text: therefore, behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that this place shall no more be called Topheth, nor The valley of the son of Hinnom, but The valley of Slaughter.

name: Jeremiah 19:7
text: I will make void the counsel of Judah and Jerusalem in this place; and I will cause them to fall by the sword before their enemies, and by the hand of those who seek their life: and their dead bodies will I give to be food for the birds of the sky, and for the animals of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 19:8
text: I will make this city an astonishment, and a hissing; everyone who passes thereby shall be astonished and hiss because of all its plagues.

name: Jeremiah 19:9
text: I will cause them to eat the flesh of their sons and the flesh of their daughters; and they shall eat everyone the flesh of his friend, in the siege and in the distress, with which their enemies, and those who seek their life, shall distress them.

name: Jeremiah 19:10
text: Then you shall break the bottle in the sight of the men who go with you,

name: Jeremiah 19:11
text: and shall tell them, Thus says Yahweh of Armies: Even so will I break this people and this city, as one breaks a potter"s vessel, that can"t be made whole again; and they shall bury in Topheth, until there is no place to bury.

name: Jeremiah 19:12
text: Thus will I do to this place, says Yahweh, and to its inhabitants, even making this city as Topheth:

name: Jeremiah 19:13
text: and the houses of Jerusalem, and the houses of the kings of Judah, which are defiled, shall be as the place of Topheth, even all the houses on whose roofs they have burned incense to all the army of the sky, and have poured out drink offerings to other gods.

name: Jeremiah 19:14
text: Then came Jeremiah from Topheth, where Yahweh had sent him to prophesy; and he stood in the court of Yahweh"s house, and said to all the people:

name: Jeremiah 19:15
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, Behold, I will bring on this city and on all its towns all the evil that I have pronounced against it; because they have made their neck stiff, that they may not hear my words.

name: Jeremiah 20:1
text: Now Pashhur, the son of Immer the priest, who was chief officer in the house of Yahweh, heard Jeremiah prophesying these things.

name: Jeremiah 20:2
text: Then Pashhur struck Jeremiah the prophet, and put him in the stocks that were in the upper gate of Benjamin, which was in the house of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 20:3
text: It happened on the next day, that Pashhur brought forth Jeremiah out of the stocks. Then Jeremiah said to him, Yahweh has not called your name Pashhur, but Magormissabib.

name: Jeremiah 20:4
text: For thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will make you a terror to yourself, and to all your friends; and they shall fall by the sword of their enemies, and your eyes shall see it; and I will give all Judah into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall carry them captive to Babylon, and shall kill them with the sword.

name: Jeremiah 20:5
text: Moreover I will give all the riches of this city, and all its gains, and all the precious things of it, yes, all the treasures of the kings of Judah will I give into the hand of their enemies; and they shall make them a prey, and take them, and carry them to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 20:6
text: You, Pashhur, and all who dwell in your house shall go into captivity; and you shall come to Babylon, and there you shall die, and there you shall be buried, you, and all your friends, to whom you have prophesied falsely.

name: Jeremiah 20:7
text: Yahweh, you have persuaded me, and I was persuaded; you are stronger than I, and have prevailed: I am become a laughing-stock all the day, every one mocks me.

name: Jeremiah 20:8
text: For as often as I speak, I cry out; I cry, Violence and destruction! because the word of Yahweh is made a reproach to me, and a derision, all the day.

name: Jeremiah 20:9
text: If I say, I will not make mention of him, nor speak any more in his name, then there is in my heart as it were a burning fire shut up in my bones, and I am weary with forbearing, and I can"t.

name: Jeremiah 20:10
text: For I have heard the defaming of many, terror on every side. Denounce, and we will denounce him, say all my familiar friends, those who watch for my fall; perhaps he will be persuaded, and we shall prevail against him, and we shall take our revenge on him.

name: Jeremiah 20:11
text: But Yahweh is with me as an awesome mighty one: therefore my persecutors shall stumble, and they shall not prevail; they shall be utterly disappointed, because they have not dealt wisely, even with an everlasting dishonor which shall never be forgotten.

name: Jeremiah 20:12
text: But, Yahweh of Armies, who tests the righteous, who sees the heart and the mind, let me see your vengeance on them; for to you have I revealed my cause.

name: Jeremiah 20:13
text: Sing to Yahweh, praise Yahweh; for he has delivered the soul of the needy from the hand of evildoers.

name: Jeremiah 20:14
text: Cursed is the day in which I was born: don"t let the day in which my mother bore me be blessed.

name: Jeremiah 20:15
text: Cursed is the man who brought news to my father, saying, A boy is born to you; making him very glad.

name: Jeremiah 20:16
text: Let that man be as the cities which Yahweh overthrew, and didn"t repent: and let him hear a cry in the morning, and shouting at noontime;

name: Jeremiah 20:17
text: because he didn"t kill me from the womb; and so my mother would have been my grave, and her womb always great.

name: Jeremiah 20:18
text: Why came I forth out of the womb to see labor and sorrow, that my days should be consumed with shame?

name: Jeremiah 21:1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, when king Zedekiah sent to him Pashhur the son of Malchijah, and Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah, the priest, saying,

name: Jeremiah 21:2
text: Please inquire of Yahweh for us; for Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon makes war against us: perhaps Yahweh will deal with us according to all his wondrous works, that he may go up from us.

name: Jeremiah 21:3
text: Then Jeremiah said to them, You shall tell Zedekiah:

name: Jeremiah 21:4
text: Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, Behold, I will turn back the weapons of war that are in your hands, with which you fight against the king of Babylon, and against the Chaldeans who besiege you, without the walls; and I will gather them into the midst of this city.

name: Jeremiah 21:5
text: I myself will fight against you with an outstretched hand and with a strong arm, even in anger, and in wrath, and in great indignation.

name: Jeremiah 21:6
text: I will strike the inhabitants of this city, both man and animal: they shall die of a great pestilence.

name: Jeremiah 21:7
text: Afterward, says Yahweh, I will deliver Zedekiah king of Judah, and his servants, and the people, even such as are left in this city from the pestilence, from the sword, and from the famine, into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of those who seek their life: and he shall strike them with the edge of the sword; he shall not spare them, neither have pity, nor have mercy.

name: Jeremiah 21:8
text: To this people you shall say, Thus says Yahweh: Behold, I set before you the way of life and the way of death.

name: Jeremiah 21:9
text: He who remains in this city shall die by the sword, and by the famine, and by the pestilence; but he who goes out, and passes over to the Chaldeans who besiege you, he shall live, and his life shall be to him for a prey.

name: Jeremiah 21:10
text: For I have set my face on this city for evil, and not for good, says Yahweh: it shall be given into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall burn it with fire.

name: Jeremiah 21:11
text: Touching the house of the king of Judah, hear the word of Yahweh:

name: Jeremiah 21:12
text: House of David, thus says Yahweh, Execute justice in the morning, and deliver him who is robbed out of the hand of the oppressor, lest my wrath go forth like fire, and burn so that none can quench it, because of the evil of your doings.

name: Jeremiah 21:13
