text: Behold, I am against you, O inhabitant of the valley, and of the rock of the plain, says Yahweh; you that say, Who shall come down against us? or who shall enter into our habitations?

name: Jeremiah 21:14
text: I will punish you according to the fruit of your doings, says Yahweh; and I will kindle a fire in her forest, and it shall devour all that is around her.

name: Jeremiah 22:1
text: Thus said Yahweh: Go down to the house of the king of Judah, and speak there this word,

name: Jeremiah 22:2
text: Say, Hear the word of Yahweh, king of Judah, who sits on the throne of David, you, and your servants, and your people who enter in by these gates.

name: Jeremiah 22:3
text: Thus says Yahweh: Execute justice and righteousness, and deliver him who is robbed out of the hand of the oppressor: and do no wrong, do no violence, to the foreigner, the fatherless, nor the widow; neither shed innocent blood in this place.

name: Jeremiah 22:4
text: For if you do this thing indeed, then shall there enter in by the gates of this house kings sitting on the throne of David, riding in chariots and on horses, he, and his servants, and his people.

name: Jeremiah 22:5
text: But if you will not hear these words, I swear by myself, says Yahweh, that this house shall become a desolation.

name: Jeremiah 22:6
text: For thus says Yahweh concerning the house of the king of Judah: You are Gilead to me, the head of Lebanon. Yet surely I will make you a wilderness, cities which are not inhabited.

name: Jeremiah 22:7
text: I will prepare destroyers against you, everyone with his weapons; and they shall cut down your choice cedars, and cast them into the fire.

name: Jeremiah 22:8
text: Many nations shall pass by this city, and they shall say every man to his neighbor, Why has Yahweh done thus to this great city?

name: Jeremiah 22:9
text: Then they shall answer, Because they forsook the covenant of Yahweh their God, and worshiped other gods, and served them.

name: Jeremiah 22:10
text: Don"t weep for the dead, neither bemoan him; but weep bitterly for him who goes away; for he shall return no more, nor see his native country.

name: Jeremiah 22:11
text: For thus says Yahweh touching Shallum the son of Josiah, king of Judah, who reigned instead of Josiah his father, and who went forth out of this place: He shall not return there any more.

name: Jeremiah 22:12
text: But in the place where they have led him captive, there shall he die, and he shall see this land no more.

name: Jeremiah 22:13
text: Woe to him who builds his house by unrighteousness, and his rooms by injustice; who uses his neighbor"s service without wages, and doesn"t give him his hire;

name: Jeremiah 22:14
text: who says, I will build me a wide house and spacious rooms, and cuts him out windows; and it is ceiling with cedar, and painted with vermilion.

name: Jeremiah 22:15
text: Shall you reign, because you strive to excel in cedar? Didn"t your father eat and drink, and do justice and righteousness? then it was well with him.

name: Jeremiah 22:16
text: He judged the cause of the poor and needy; then it was well. Wasn"t this to know me? says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 22:17
text: But your eyes and your heart are not but for your covetousness, and for shedding innocent blood, and for oppression, and for violence, to do it.

name: Jeremiah 22:18
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh concerning Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah: they shall not lament for him, saying, Ah my brother! or, Ah sister! They shall not lament for him, saying Ah lord! or, Ah his glory!

name: Jeremiah 22:19
text: He shall be buried with the burial of a donkey, drawn and cast forth beyond the gates of Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 22:20
text: Go up to Lebanon, and cry; and lift up your voice in Bashan, and cry from Abarim; for all your lovers are destroyed.

name: Jeremiah 22:21
text: I spoke to you in your prosperity; but you said, I will not hear. This has been your way from your youth, that you didn"t obey my voice.

name: Jeremiah 22:22
text: The wind shall feed all your shepherds, and your lovers shall go into captivity: surely then you will be ashamed and confounded for all your wickedness.

name: Jeremiah 22:23
text: Inhabitant of Lebanon, who makes your nest in the cedars, how greatly to be pitied you will be when pangs come on you, the pain as of a woman in travail!

name: Jeremiah 22:24
text: As I live, says Yahweh, though Coniah the son of Jehoiakim king of Judah were the signet on my right hand, yet would I pluck you there;

name: Jeremiah 22:25
text: and I will give you into the hand of those who seek your life, and into the hand of them of whom you are afraid, even into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of the Chaldeans.

name: Jeremiah 22:26
text: I will cast you out, and your mother who bore you, into another country, where you were not born; and there you will die.

name: Jeremiah 22:27
text: But to the land whereunto their soul longs to return, there shall they not return.

name: Jeremiah 22:28
text: Is this man Coniah a despised broken vessel? is he a vessel in which none delights? why are they cast out, he and his seed, and are cast into the land which they don"t know?

name: Jeremiah 22:29
text: O earth, earth, earth, hear the word of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 22:30
text: Thus says Yahweh, Write you this man childless, a man who shall not prosper in his days; for no more shall a man of his seed prosper, sitting on the throne of David, and ruling in Judah.

name: Jeremiah 23:1
text: Woe to the shepherds who destroy and scatter the sheep of my pasture! says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:2
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, against the shepherds who feed my people: You have scattered my flock, and driven them away, and have not visited them; behold, I will visit on you the evil of your doings, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:3
text: I will gather the remnant of my flock out of all the countries where I have driven them, and will bring them again to their folds; and they shall be fruitful and multiply.

name: Jeremiah 23:4
text: I will set up shepherds over them, who shall feed them; and they shall fear no more, nor be dismayed, neither shall any be lacking, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:5
text: Behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that I will raise to David a righteous Branch, and he shall reign as king and deal wisely, and shall execute justice and righteousness in the land.

name: Jeremiah 23:6
text: In his days Judah shall be saved, and Israel shall dwell safely; and this is his name by which he shall be called: Yahweh our righteousness.

name: Jeremiah 23:7
text: Therefore, behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that they shall no more say, As Yahweh lives, who brought up the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt;

name: Jeremiah 23:8
text: but, As Yahweh lives, who brought up and who led the seed of the house of Israel out of the north country, and from all the countries where I had driven them. They shall dwell in their own land.

name: Jeremiah 23:9
text: Concerning the prophets. My heart within me is broken, all my bones shake; I am like a drunken man, and like a man whom wine has overcome, because of Yahweh, and because of his holy words.

name: Jeremiah 23:10
text: For the land is full of adulterers; for because of swearing the land mourns; the pastures of the wilderness are dried up. Their course is evil, and their might is not right;

name: Jeremiah 23:11
text: for both prophet and priest are profane; yes, in my house have I found their wickedness, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:12
text: Therefore their way shall be to them as slippery places in the darkness: they shall be driven on, and fall therein; for I will bring evil on them, even the year of their visitation, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:13
text: I have seen folly in the prophets of Samaria; they prophesied by Baal, and caused my people Israel to err.

name: Jeremiah 23:14
text: In the prophets of Jerusalem also I have seen a horrible thing: they commit adultery, and walk in lies; and they strengthen the hands of evildoers, so that none does return from his wickedness: they are all of them become to me as Sodom, and its inhabitants as Gomorrah.

name: Jeremiah 23:15
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh of Armies concerning the prophets: Behold, I will feed them with wormwood, and make them drink the water of gall; for from the prophets of Jerusalem is ungodliness gone forth into all the land.

name: Jeremiah 23:16
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, Don"t listen to the words of the prophets who prophesy to you: they teach you vanity; they speak a vision of their own heart, and not out of the mouth of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:17
text: They say continually to those who despise me, Yahweh has said, You shall have peace; and to everyone who walks in the stubbornness of his own heart they say, No evil shall come on you.

name: Jeremiah 23:18
text: For who has stood in the council of Yahweh, that he should perceive and hear his word? who has marked my word, and heard it?

name: Jeremiah 23:19
text: Behold, the storm of Yahweh, his wrath, has gone forth. Yes, a whirling storm. It shall burst on the head of the wicked.

name: Jeremiah 23:20
text: The anger of Yahweh shall not return, until he has executed, and until he have performed the intents of his heart: in the latter days you shall understand it perfectly.

name: Jeremiah 23:21
text: I sent not these prophets, yet they ran: I didn"t speak to them, yet they prophesied.

name: Jeremiah 23:22
text: But if they had stood in my council, then had they caused my people to hear my words, and had turned them from their evil way, and from the evil of their doings.

name: Jeremiah 23:23
text: Am I a God at hand, says Yahweh, and not a God afar off?

name: Jeremiah 23:24
text: Can any hide himself in secret places so that I shall not see him? says Yahweh. Don"t I fill heaven and earth? says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:25
text: I have heard what the prophets have said, who prophesy lies in my name, saying, I have dreamed, I have dreamed.

name: Jeremiah 23:26
text: How long shall this be in the heart of the prophets who prophesy lies, even the prophets of the deceit of their own heart?

name: Jeremiah 23:27
text: who think to cause my people to forget my name by their dreams which they tell every man to his neighbor, as their fathers forgot my name for Baal.

name: Jeremiah 23:28
text: The prophet who has a dream, let him tell a dream; and he who has my word, let him speak my word faithfully. What is the straw to the wheat? says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:29
text: Isn"t my word like fire? says Yahweh; and like a hammer that breaks the rock in pieces?

name: Jeremiah 23:30
text: Therefore, behold, I am against the prophets, says Yahweh, who steal my words everyone from his neighbor.

name: Jeremiah 23:31
text: Behold, I am against the prophets, says Yahweh, who use their tongues, and say, He says.

name: Jeremiah 23:32
text: Behold, I am against those who prophesy lying dreams, says Yahweh, and do tell them, and cause my people to err by their lies, and by their vain boasting: yet I didn"t send them, nor commanded them; neither do they profit this people at all, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:33
text: When this people, or the prophet, or a priest, shall ask you, saying, What is the burden of Yahweh? Then you shall tell them, What burden! I will cast you off, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 23:34
text: As for the prophet, and the priest, and the people, who shall say, The burden of Yahweh, I will even punish that man and his house.

name: Jeremiah 23:35
text: You shall say everyone to his neighbor, and everyone to his brother, What has Yahweh answered? and, What has Yahweh spoken?

name: Jeremiah 23:36
text: You shall mention the burden of Yahweh no more: for every man"s own word shall be his burden; for you have perverted the words of the living God, of Yahweh of Armies our God.

name: Jeremiah 23:37
text: You shall say to the prophet, What has Yahweh answered you? and, What has Yahweh spoken?

name: Jeremiah 23:38
text: But if you say, The burden of Yahweh; therefore thus says Yahweh: Because you say this word, The burden of Yahweh, and I have sent to you, saying, You shall not say, The burden of Yahweh;

name: Jeremiah 23:39
text: therefore, behold, I will utterly forget you, and I will cast you off, and the city that I gave to you and to your fathers, away from my presence:

name: Jeremiah 23:40
text: and I will bring an everlasting reproach on you, and a perpetual shame, which shall not be forgotten.

name: Jeremiah 24:1
text: Yahweh showed me, and behold, two baskets of figs set before the temple of Yahweh, after that Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had carried away captive Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, and the princes of Judah, with the craftsmen and smiths, from Jerusalem, and had brought them to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 24:2
text: One basket had very good figs, like the figs that are first-ripe; and the other basket had very bad figs, which could not be eaten, they were so bad.

name: Jeremiah 24:3
text: Then Yahweh said to me, What do you see, Jeremiah? I said, Figs; the good figs, very good; and the bad, very bad, that can"t be eaten, they are so bad.

name: Jeremiah 24:4
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Jeremiah 24:5
text: Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel: Like these good figs, so will I regard the captives of Judah, whom I have sent out of this place into the land of the Chaldeans, for good.

name: Jeremiah 24:6
text: For I will set my eyes on them for good, and I will bring them again to this land: and I will build them, and not pull them down; and I will plant them, and not pluck them up.

name: Jeremiah 24:7
text: I will give them a heart to know me, that I am Yahweh: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God; for they shall return to me with their whole heart.

name: Jeremiah 24:8
text: As the bad figs, which can"t be eaten, they are so bad, surely thus says Yahweh, So will I give up Zedekiah the king of Judah, and his princes, and the residue of Jerusalem, who remain in this land, and those who dwell in the land of Egypt,

name: Jeremiah 24:9
text: I will even give them up to be tossed back and forth among all the kingdoms of the earth for evil; to be a reproach and a proverb, a taunt and a curse, in all places where I shall drive them.

name: Jeremiah 24:10
text: I will send the sword, the famine, and the pestilence, among them, until they be consumed from off the land that I gave to them and to their fathers.

name: Jeremiah 25:1
text: The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the people of Judah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah (the same was the first year of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon),

name: Jeremiah 25:2
text: which Jeremiah the prophet spoke to all the people of Judah, and to all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, saying:

name: Jeremiah 25:3
text: From the thirteenth year of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah, even to this day, these twenty-three years, the word of Yahweh has come to me, and I have spoken to you, rising up early and speaking; but you have not listened.

name: Jeremiah 25:4
text: Yahweh has sent to you all his servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them (but you have not listened, nor inclined your ear to hear)

name: Jeremiah 25:5
text: saying, Return now everyone from his evil way, and from the evil of your doings, and dwell in the land that Yahweh has given to you and to your fathers, from of old and even forevermore;

name: Jeremiah 25:6
text: and don"t go after other gods to serve them or worship them, and don"t provoke me to anger with the work of your hands; and I will do you no harm.

name: Jeremiah 25:7
text: Yet you have not listened to me, says Yahweh; that you may provoke me to anger with the work of your hands to your own hurt.

name: Jeremiah 25:8
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh of Armies: Because you have not heard my words,

name: Jeremiah 25:9
text: behold, I will send and take all the families of the north, says Yahweh, and I will send to Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon, my servant, and will bring them against this land, and against its inhabitants, and against all these nations around; and I will utterly destroy them, and make them an astonishment, and a hissing, and perpetual desolations.

name: Jeremiah 25:10
text: Moreover I will take from them the voice of mirth and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom and the voice of the bride, the sound of the millstones, and the light of the lamp.

name: Jeremiah 25:11
text: This whole land shall be a desolation, and an astonishment; and these nations shall serve the king of Babylon seventy years.

name: Jeremiah 25:12
text: It shall happen, when seventy years are accomplished, that I will punish the king of Babylon, and that nation, says Yahweh, for their iniquity, and the land of the Chaldeans; and I will make it desolate forever.

name: Jeremiah 25:13
text: I will bring on that land all my words which I have pronounced against it, even all that is written in this book, which Jeremiah has prophesied against all the nations.

name: Jeremiah 25:14
text: For many nations and great kings shall make bondservants of them, even of them; and I will recompense them according to their deeds, and according to the work of their hands.

name: Jeremiah 25:15
text: For thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, to me: take this cup of the wine of wrath at my hand, and cause all the nations, to whom I send you, to drink it.

name: Jeremiah 25:16
text: They shall drink, and reel back and forth, and be mad, because of the sword that I will send among them.

name: Jeremiah 25:17
text: Then took I the cup at Yahweh"s hand, and made all the nations to drink, to whom Yahweh had sent me:

name: Jeremiah 25:18
text: Jerusalem, and the cities of Judah, and its kings, and its princes, to make them a desolation, an astonishment, a hissing, and a curse, as it is this day;

name: Jeremiah 25:19
text: Pharaoh king of Egypt, and his servants, and his princes, and all his people;

name: Jeremiah 25:20
text: and all the mixed people, and all the kings of the land of the Uz, and all the kings of the Philistines, and Ashkelon, and Gaza, and Ekron, and the remnant of Ashdod;

name: Jeremiah 25:21
text: Edom, and Moab, and the children of Ammon;

name: Jeremiah 25:22
text: and all the kings of Tyre, and all the kings of Sidon, and the kings of the isle which is beyond the sea;

name: Jeremiah 25:23
text: Dedan, and Tema, and Buz, and all who have the corners of their beard cut off;

name: Jeremiah 25:24
text: and all the kings of Arabia, and all the kings of the mixed people who dwell in the wilderness;

name: Jeremiah 25:25
text: and all the kings of Zimri, and all the kings of Elam, and all the kings of the Medes;

name: Jeremiah 25:26
text: and all the kings of the north, far and near, one with another; and all the kingdoms of the world, which are on the surface of the earth: and the king of Sheshach shall drink after them.

name: Jeremiah 25:27
text: You shall tell them, Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Drink, and be drunk, vomit, fall, and rise no more, because of the sword which I will send among you.

name: Jeremiah 25:28
text: It shall be, if they refuse to take the cup at your hand to drink, then you shall tell them, Thus says Yahweh of Armies: You shall surely drink.

name: Jeremiah 25:29
text: For, behold, I begin to work evil at the city which is called by my name; and should you be utterly unpunished? You shall not be unpunished; for I will call for a sword on all the inhabitants of the earth, says Yahweh of Armies.

name: Jeremiah 25:30
text: Therefore prophesy you against them all these words, and tell them, Yahweh will roar from on high, and utter his voice from his holy habitation; he will mightily roar against his fold; he will give a shout, as those who tread grapes, against all the inhabitants of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 25:31
text: A noise shall come even to the end of the earth; for Yahweh has a controversy with the nations; he will enter into judgment with all flesh: as for the wicked, he will give them to the sword, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 25:32
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, Behold, evil shall go forth from nation to nation, and a great storm shall be raised up from the uttermost parts of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 25:33
text: The slain of Yahweh shall be at that day from one end of the earth even to the other end of the earth: they shall not be lamented, neither gathered, nor buried; they shall be dung on the surface of the ground.

name: Jeremiah 25:34
text: Wail, you shepherds, and cry; and wallow in dust, you principal of the flock; for the days of your slaughter and of your dispersions are fully come, and you shall fall like a goodly vessel.

name: Jeremiah 25:35
text: The shepherds shall have no way to flee, nor the principal of the flock to escape.

name: Jeremiah 25:36
text: A voice of the cry of the shepherds, and the wailing of the principal of the flock! for Yahweh lays waste their pasture.

name: Jeremiah 25:37
text: The peaceable folds are brought to silence because of the fierce anger of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 25:38
text: He has left his covert, as the lion; for their land has become an astonishment because of the fierceness of the oppression, and because of his fierce anger.

name: Jeremiah 26:1
text: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, came this word from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 26:2
text: Thus says Yahweh: Stand in the court of Yahweh"s house, and speak to all the cities of Judah, which come to worship in Yahweh"s house, all the words that I command you to speak to them; don"t diminish a word.

name: Jeremiah 26:3
text: It may be they will listen, and turn every man from his evil way; that I may repent me of the evil which I purpose to do to them because of the evil of their doings.

name: Jeremiah 26:4
text: You shall tell them, Thus says Yahweh: If you will not listen to me, to walk in my law, which I have set before you,

name: Jeremiah 26:5
text: to listen to the words of my servants the prophets, whom I send to you, even rising up early and sending them, but you have not listened;

name: Jeremiah 26:6
text: then will I make this house like Shiloh, and will make this city a curse to all the nations of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 26:7
text: The priests and the prophets and all the people heard Jeremiah speaking these words in the house of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 26:8
text: It happened, when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking all that Yahweh had commanded him to speak to all the people, that the priests and the prophets and all the people laid hold on him, saying, You shall surely die.

name: Jeremiah 26:9
text: Why have you prophesied in the name of Yahweh, saying, This house shall be like Shiloh, and this city shall be desolate, without inhabitant? All the people were gathered to Jeremiah in the house of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 26:10
text: When the princes of Judah heard these things, they came up from the king"s house to the house of Yahweh; and they sat in the entry of the new gate of Yahweh"s house.

name: Jeremiah 26:11
text: Then spoke the priests and the prophets to the princes and to all the people, saying, This man is worthy of death; for he has prophesied against this city, as you have heard with your ears.

name: Jeremiah 26:12
text: Then spoke Jeremiah to all the princes and to all the people, saying, Yahweh sent me to prophesy against this house and against this city all the words that you have heard.

name: Jeremiah 26:13
text: Now therefore amend your ways and your doings, and obey the voice of Yahweh your God; and Yahweh will repent him of the evil that he has pronounced against you.

name: Jeremiah 26:14
text: But as for me, behold, I am in your hand: do with me as is good and right in your eyes.

name: Jeremiah 26:15
text: Only know for certain that, if you put me to death, you will bring innocent blood on yourselves, and on this city, and on its inhabitants; for of a truth Yahweh has sent me to you to speak all these words in your ears.

name: Jeremiah 26:16
text: Then the princes and all the people said to the priests and to the prophets: This man is not worthy of death; for he has spoken to us in the name of Yahweh our God.

name: Jeremiah 26:17
text: Then rose up certain of the elders of the land, and spoke to all the assembly of the people, saying,

name: Jeremiah 26:18
text: Micah the Morashtite prophesied in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah; and he spoke to all the people of Judah, saying, Thus says Yahweh of Armies: Zion shall be plowed as a field, and Jerusalem shall become heaps, and the mountain of the house as the high places of a forest.

name: Jeremiah 26:19
text: Did Hezekiah king of Judah and all Judah put him to death? Didn"t he fear Yahweh, and entreat the favor of Yahweh, and Yahweh relented of the disaster which he had pronounced against them? Thus should we commit great evil against our own souls.

name: Jeremiah 26:20
text: There was also a man who prophesied in the name of Yahweh, Uriah the son of Shemaiah of Kiriath Jearim; and he prophesied against this city and against this land according to all the words of Jeremiah:

name: Jeremiah 26:21
text: and when Jehoiakim the king, with all his mighty men, and all the princes, heard his words, the king sought to put him to death; but when Uriah heard it, he was afraid, and fled, and went into Egypt:

name: Jeremiah 26:22
text: and Jehoiakim the king sent men into Egypt, Elnathan the son of Achbor, and certain men with him, into Egypt;

name: Jeremiah 26:23
text: and they fetched forth Uriah out of Egypt, and brought him to Jehoiakim the king, who killed him with the sword, and cast his dead body into the graves of the common people.

name: Jeremiah 26:24
text: But the hand of Ahikam the son of Shaphan was with Jeremiah, that they should not give him into the hand of the people to put him to death.

name: Jeremiah 27:1
text: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, came this word to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 27:2
text: Thus says Yahweh to me: Make bonds and bars, and put them on your neck;

name: Jeremiah 27:3
text: and send them to the king of Edom, and to the king of Moab, and to the king of the children of Ammon, and to the king of Tyre, and to the king of Sidon, by the hand of the messengers who come to Jerusalem to Zedekiah king of Judah;

name: Jeremiah 27:4
text: and give them a command to their masters, saying, Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, You shall tell your masters:

name: Jeremiah 27:5
text: I have made the earth, the men and the animals that are on the surface of the earth, by my great power and by my outstretched arm; and I give it to whom it seems right to me.

name: Jeremiah 27:6
text: Now have I given all these lands into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon, my servant; and the animals of the field also have I given him to serve him.

name: Jeremiah 27:7
text: All the nations shall serve him, and his son, and his son"s son, until the time of his own land come: and then many nations and great kings shall make him their bondservant.

name: Jeremiah 27:8
text: It shall happen, that the nation and the kingdom which will not serve the same Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and that will not put their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon, that nation will I punish, says Yahweh, with the sword, and with the famine, and with the pestilence, until I have consumed them by his hand.

name: Jeremiah 27:9
text: But as for you, don"t you listen to your prophets, nor to your diviners, nor to your dreams, nor to your soothsayers, nor to your sorcerers, who speak to you, saying, You shall not serve the king of Babylon:

name: Jeremiah 27:10
text: for they prophesy a lie to you, to remove you far from your land, and that I should drive you out, and you should perish.

name: Jeremiah 27:11
text: But the nation that shall bring their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon, and serve him, that nation will I let remain in their own land, says Yahweh; and they shall till it, and dwell therein.

name: Jeremiah 27:12
text: I spoke to Zedekiah king of Judah according to all these words, saying, Bring your necks under the yoke of the king of Babylon, and serve him and his people, and live.

name: Jeremiah 27:13
text: Why will you die, you and your people, by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence, as Yahweh has spoken concerning the nation that will not serve the king of Babylon?

name: Jeremiah 27:14
text: Don"t listen to the words of the prophets who speak to you, saying, You shall not serve the king of Babylon; for they prophesy a lie to you.

name: Jeremiah 27:15
text: For I have not sent them, says Yahweh, but they prophesy falsely in my name; that I may drive you out, and that you may perish, you, and the prophets who prophesy to you.

name: Jeremiah 27:16
text: Also I spoke to the priests and to all this people, saying, Thus says Yahweh: Don"t listen to the words of your prophets who prophesy to you, saying, Behold, the vessels of Yahweh"s house shall now shortly be brought again from Babylon; for they prophesy a lie to you.

name: Jeremiah 27:17
text: Don"t listen to them; serve the king of Babylon, and live: why should this city become a desolation?

name: Jeremiah 27:18
text: But if they be prophets, and if the word of Yahweh be with them, let them now make intercession to Yahweh of Armies, that the vessels which are left in the house of Yahweh, and in the house of the king of Judah, and at Jerusalem, don"t go to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 27:19
text: For thus says Yahweh of Armies concerning the pillars, and concerning the sea, and concerning the bases, and concerning the residue of the vessels that are left in this city,

name: Jeremiah 27:20
text: which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon didn"t take, when he carried away captive Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, from Jerusalem to Babylon, and all the nobles of Judah and Jerusalem;

name: Jeremiah 27:21
text: yes, thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, concerning the vessels that are left in the house of Yahweh, and in the house of the king of Judah, and at Jerusalem:

name: Jeremiah 27:22
text: They shall be carried to Babylon, and there shall they be, until the day that I visit them, says Yahweh; then will I bring them up, and restore them to this place.

name: Jeremiah 28:1
text: It happened the same year, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the fourth year, in the fifth month, that Hananiah the son of Azzur, the prophet, who was of Gibeon, spoke to me in the house of Yahweh, in the presence of the priests and of all the people, saying,

name: Jeremiah 28:2
text: Thus speaks Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, saying, I have broken the yoke of the king of Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 28:3
text: Within two full years will I bring again into this place all the vessels of Yahweh"s house, that Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon took away from this place, and carried to Babylon:

name: Jeremiah 28:4
text: and I will bring again to this place Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, with all the captives of Judah, who went to Babylon, says Yahweh; for I will break the yoke of the king of Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 28:5
text: Then the prophet Jeremiah said to the prophet Hananiah in the presence of the priests, and in the presence of all the people who stood in the house of Yahweh,

name: Jeremiah 28:6
text: even the prophet Jeremiah said, Amen: Yahweh do so; Yahweh perform your words which you have prophesied, to bring again the vessels of Yahweh"s house, and all them of the captivity, from Babylon to this place.

name: Jeremiah 28:7
text: Nevertheless hear you now this word that I speak in your ears, and in the ears of all the people:

name: Jeremiah 28:8
text: The prophets who have been before me and before you of old prophesied against many countries, and against great kingdoms, of war, and of evil, and of pestilence.

name: Jeremiah 28:9
text: The prophet who prophesies of peace, when the word of the prophet shall happen, then shall the prophet be known, that Yahweh has truly sent him.

name: Jeremiah 28:10
text: Then Hananiah the prophet took the bar from off the prophet Jeremiah"s neck, and broke it.

name: Jeremiah 28:11
text: Hananiah spoke in the presence of all the people, saying, Thus says Yahweh: Even so will I break the yoke of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon within two full years from off the neck of all the nations. The prophet Jeremiah went his way.

name: Jeremiah 28:12
text: Then the word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah, after that Hananiah the prophet had broken the bar from off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 28:13
text: Go, and tell Hananiah, saying, Thus says Yahweh: You have broken the bars of wood; but you have made in their place bars of iron.

name: Jeremiah 28:14
text: For thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: I have put a yoke of iron on the neck of all these nations, that they may serve Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon; and they shall serve him: and I have given him the animals of the field also.

name: Jeremiah 28:15
text: Then the prophet Jeremiah said to Hananiah the prophet, Hear now, Hananiah: Yahweh has not sent you; but you make this people to trust in a lie.

name: Jeremiah 28:16
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will send you away from off the surface of the earth: this year you shall die, because you have spoken rebellion against Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 28:17
text: So Hananiah the prophet died the same year in the seventh month.

name: Jeremiah 29:1
text: Now these are the words of the letter that Jeremiah the prophet sent from Jerusalem to the residue of the elders of the captivity, and to the priests, to the prophets, and to all the people, whom Nebuchadnezzar had carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon,

name: Jeremiah 29:2
text: (after that Jeconiah the king, the queen mother, the eunuchs, the princes of Judah and Jerusalem, the craftsmen, and the smiths, had departed from Jerusalem),

name: Jeremiah 29:3
text: by the hand of Elasah the son of Shaphan, and Gemariah the son of Hilkiah, (whom Zedekiah king of Judah sent to Babylon to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon), saying,

name: Jeremiah 29:4
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, to all the captivity, whom I have caused to be carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon:

name: Jeremiah 29:5
text: Build houses, and dwell in them; and plant gardens, and eat their fruit.

name: Jeremiah 29:6
text: Take wives, and father sons and daughters; and take wives for your sons, and give your daughters to husbands, that they may bear sons and daughters; and multiply there, and don"t be diminished.

name: Jeremiah 29:7
text: Seek the peace of the city where I have caused you to be carried away captive, and pray to Yahweh for it; for in its peace you shall have peace.

name: Jeremiah 29:8
text: For thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Don"t let your prophets who are in the midst of you, and your diviners, deceive you; neither listen to your dreams which you cause to be dreamed.

name: Jeremiah 29:9
text: For they prophesy falsely to you in my name: I have not sent them, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 29:10
text: For thus says Yahweh, After seventy years are accomplished for Babylon, I will visit you, and perform my good word toward you, in causing you to return to this place.

name: Jeremiah 29:11
text: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, says Yahweh, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you hope and a future.

name: Jeremiah 29:12
text: You shall call on me, and you shall go and pray to me, and I will listen to you.

name: Jeremiah 29:13
text: You shall seek me, and find me, when you shall search for me with all your heart.

name: Jeremiah 29:14
text: I will be found by you, says Yahweh, and I will turn again your captivity, and I will gather you from all the nations, and from all the places where I have driven you, says Yahweh; and I will bring you again to the place from where I caused you to be carried away captive.

name: Jeremiah 29:15
text: Because you have said, Yahweh has raised us up prophets in Babylon;

name: Jeremiah 29:16
text: thus says Yahweh concerning the king who sits on the throne of David, and concerning all the people who dwell in this city, your brothers who haven"t gone forth with you into captivity;

name: Jeremiah 29:17
text: thus says Yahweh of Armies; Behold, I will send on them the sword, the famine, and the pestilence, and will make them like vile figs, that can"t be eaten, they are so bad.

name: Jeremiah 29:18
text: I will pursue after them with the sword, with the famine, and with the pestilence, and will deliver them to be tossed back and forth among all the kingdoms of the earth, to be an object of horror, and an astonishment, and a hissing, and a reproach, among all the nations where I have driven them;

name: Jeremiah 29:19
text: because they have not listened to my words, says Yahweh, with which I sent to them my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them; but you would not hear, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 29:20
text: Hear therefore the word of Yahweh, all you of the captivity, whom I have sent away from Jerusalem to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 29:21
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, concerning Ahab the son of Kolaiah, and concerning Zedekiah the son of Maaseiah, who prophesy a lie to you in my name: Behold, I will deliver them into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon; and he shall kill them before your eyes;

name: Jeremiah 29:22
text: and of them shall be taken up a curse by all the captives of Judah who are in Babylon, saying, Yahweh make you like Zedekiah and like Ahab, whom the king of Babylon roasted in the fire;

name: Jeremiah 29:23
text: because they have worked folly in Israel, and have committed adultery with their neighbors" wives, and have spoken words in my name falsely, which I didn"t command them; and I am he who knows, and am witness, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 29:24
text: Concerning Shemaiah the Nehelamite you shall speak, saying,

name: Jeremiah 29:25
text: Thus speaks Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, saying, Because you have sent letters in your own name to all the people who are at Jerusalem, and to Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah, the priest, and to all the priests, saying,

name: Jeremiah 29:26
text: Yahweh has made you priest in the place of Jehoiada the priest, that there may be officers in the house of Yahweh, for every man who is mad, and makes himself a prophet, that you should put him in the stocks and in shackles.

name: Jeremiah 29:27
text: Now therefore, why have you not rebuked Jeremiah of Anathoth, who makes himself a prophet to you,

name: Jeremiah 29:28
text: because he has sent to us in Babylon, saying, The captivity is long: build houses, and dwell in them; and plant gardens, and eat their fruit?

name: Jeremiah 29:29
text: Zephaniah the priest read this letter in the ears of Jeremiah the prophet.

name: Jeremiah 29:30
text: Then came the word of Yahweh to Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 29:31
text: Send to all them of the captivity, saying, Thus says Yahweh concerning Shemaiah the Nehelamite: Because Shemaiah has prophesied to you, and I didn"t send him, and he has caused you to trust in a lie;

name: Jeremiah 29:32
text: therefore thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will punish Shemaiah the Nehelamite, and his seed; he shall not have a man to dwell among this people, neither shall he see the good that I will do to my people, says Yahweh, because he has spoken rebellion against Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 30:1
text: The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 30:2
text: Thus speaks Yahweh, the God of Israel, saying, Write all the words that I have spoken to you in a book.

name: Jeremiah 30:3
text: For, behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that I will turn again the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, says Yahweh; and I will cause them to return to the land that I gave to their fathers, and they shall possess it.

name: Jeremiah 30:4
text: These are the words that Yahweh spoke concerning Israel and concerning Judah.

name: Jeremiah 30:5
text: For thus says Yahweh: We have heard a voice of trembling, of fear, and not of peace.

name: Jeremiah 30:6
text: Ask now, and see whether a man does travail with child: why do I see every man with his hands on his waist, as a woman in travail, and all faces are turned into paleness?

name: Jeremiah 30:7
text: Alas! for that day is great, so that none is like it: it is even the time of Jacob"s trouble; but he shall be saved out of it.

name: Jeremiah 30:8
text: It shall come to pass in that day, says Yahweh of Armies, that I will break his yoke from off your neck, and will burst your bonds; and strangers shall no more make him their bondservant;

name: Jeremiah 30:9
text: but they shall serve Yahweh their God, and David their king, whom I will raise up to them.

name: Jeremiah 30:10
text: Therefore don"t you be afraid, O Jacob my servant, says Yahweh; neither be dismayed, Israel: for, behold, I will save you from afar, and your seed from the land of their captivity; and Jacob shall return, and shall be quiet and at ease, and none shall make him afraid.

name: Jeremiah 30:11
text: For I am with you, says Yahweh, to save you: for I will make a full end of all the nations where I have scattered you, but I will not make a full end of you; but I will correct you in measure, and will in no way leave you unpunished.

name: Jeremiah 30:12
text: For thus says Yahweh, Your hurt is incurable, and your wound grievous.

name: Jeremiah 30:13
text: There is none to plead your cause, that you may be bound up: you have no healing medicines.

name: Jeremiah 30:14
text: All your lovers have forgotten you; they don"t seek you: for I have wounded you with the wound of an enemy, with the chastisement of a cruel one, for the greatness of your iniquity, because your sins were increased.

name: Jeremiah 30:15
text: Why do you cry for your hurt? Your pain is incurable: for the greatness of your iniquity, because your sins were increased, I have done these things to you.

name: Jeremiah 30:16
text: Therefore all those who devour you shall be devoured; and all your adversaries, everyone of them, shall go into captivity; and those who despoil you shall be a spoil, and all who prey on you will I give for a prey.

name: Jeremiah 30:17
text: For I will restore health to you, and I will heal you of your wounds, says Yahweh; because they have called you an outcast, saying, It is Zion, whom no man seeks after.

name: Jeremiah 30:18
text: Thus says Yahweh: Behold, I will turn again the captivity of Jacob"s tents, and have compassion on his dwelling places; and the city shall be built on its own hill, and the palace shall be inhabited in its own way.

name: Jeremiah 30:19
text: Out of them shall proceed thanksgiving and the voice of those who make merry: and I will multiply them, and they shall not be few; I will also glorify them, and they shall not be small.

name: Jeremiah 30:20
text: Their children also shall be as before, and their congregation shall be established before me; and I will punish all who oppress them.

name: Jeremiah 30:21
text: Their prince shall be of themselves, and their ruler shall proceed from their midst; and I will cause him to draw near, and he shall approach to me: for who is he who has had boldness to approach to me? says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 30:22
text: You shall be my people, and I will be your God.

name: Jeremiah 30:23
text: Behold, the storm of Yahweh, his wrath, has gone forth, a sweeping storm: it shall burst on the head of the wicked.

name: Jeremiah 30:24
text: The fierce anger of Yahweh will not return, until he has executed, and until he has performed the intentions of his heart. In the latter days you will understand it.

name: Jeremiah 31:1
text: At that time, says Yahweh, will I be the God of all the families of Israel, and they shall be my people.

name: Jeremiah 31:2
text: Thus says Yahweh, The people who were left of the sword found favor in the wilderness; even Israel, when I went to cause him to rest.

name: Jeremiah 31:3
text: Yahweh appeared of old to me, saying, Yes, I have loved you with an everlasting love: therefore with loving kindness have I drawn you.

name: Jeremiah 31:4
text: Again will I build you, and you shall be built, O virgin of Israel: again you shall be adorned with your tambourines, and shall go forth in the dances of those who make merry.

name: Jeremiah 31:5
text: Again you shall plant vineyards on the mountains of Samaria; the planters shall plant, and shall enjoy its fruit.

name: Jeremiah 31:6
text: For there shall be a day, that the watchmen on the hills of Ephraim shall cry, Arise, and let us go up to Zion to Yahweh our God.

name: Jeremiah 31:7
text: For thus says Yahweh, Sing with gladness for Jacob, and shout for the chief of the nations: publish, praise, and say, Yahweh, save your people, the remnant of Israel.

name: Jeremiah 31:8
text: Behold, I will bring them from the north country, and gather them from the uttermost parts of the earth, along with the blind and the lame, the woman with child and her who travails with child together: a great company shall they return here.

name: Jeremiah 31:9
text: They shall come with weeping; and with petitions will I lead them: I will cause them to walk by rivers of waters, in a straight way in which they shall not stumble; for I am a father to Israel, and Ephraim is my firstborn.

name: Jeremiah 31:10
text: Hear the word of Yahweh, you nations, and declare it in the islands afar off; and say, He who scattered Israel will gather him, and keep him, as shepherd does his flock.

name: Jeremiah 31:11
text: For Yahweh has ransomed Jacob, and redeemed him from the hand of him who was stronger than he.

name: Jeremiah 31:12
text: They shall come and sing in the height of Zion, and shall flow to the goodness of Yahweh, to the grain, and to the new wine, and to the oil, and to the young of the flock and of the herd: and their soul shall be as a watered garden; and they shall not sorrow any more at all.

name: Jeremiah 31:13
text: Then shall the virgin rejoice in the dance, and the young men and the old together; for I will turn their mourning into joy, and will comfort them, and make them rejoice from their sorrow.

name: Jeremiah 31:14
text: I will satiate the soul of the priests with fatness, and my people shall be satisfied with my goodness, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 31:15
text: Thus says Yahweh: A voice is heard in Ramah, lamentation, and bitter weeping, Rachel weeping for her children; she refuses to be comforted for her children, because they are no more.

name: Jeremiah 31:16
text: Thus says Yahweh: Refrain your voice from weeping, and your eyes from tears; for your work shall be rewarded, says Yahweh; and they shall come again from the land of the enemy.

name: Jeremiah 31:17
text: There is hope for your latter end, says Yahweh; and your children shall come again to their own border.

name: Jeremiah 31:18
text: I have surely heard Ephraim bemoaning himself thus, You have chastised me, and I was chastised, as an untrained calf: turn me, and I shall be turned; for you are Yahweh my God.

name: Jeremiah 31:19
text: Surely after that I was turned, I repented; and after that I was instructed, I struck on my thigh: I was ashamed, yes, even confounded, because I bore the reproach of my youth.

name: Jeremiah 31:20
text: Is Ephraim my dear son? is he a darling child? for as often as I speak against him, I do earnestly remember him still: therefore my heart yearns for him; I will surely have mercy on him, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 31:21
text: Set up road signs, make guideposts; set your heart toward the highway, even the way by which you went: turn again, virgin of Israel, turn again to these your cities.

name: Jeremiah 31:22
text: How long will you go here and there, you backsliding daughter? for Yahweh has created a new thing in the earth: a woman shall encompass a man.

name: Jeremiah 31:23
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, Yet again shall they use this speech in the land of Judah and in its cities, when I shall bring again their captivity: Yahweh bless you, habitation of righteousness, mountain of holiness.

name: Jeremiah 31:24
text: Judah and all its cities shall dwell therein together, the farmers, and those who go about with flocks.

name: Jeremiah 31:25
text: For I have satiated the weary soul, and every sorrowful soul have I replenished.

name: Jeremiah 31:26
text: On this I awakened, and saw; and my sleep was sweet to me.

name: Jeremiah 31:27
text: Behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that I will sow the house of Israel and the house of Judah with the seed of man, and with the seed of animal.

name: Jeremiah 31:28
text: It shall happen that, like as I have watched over them to pluck up and to break down and to overthrow and to destroy and to afflict, so will I watch over them to build and to plant, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 31:29
text: In those days they shall say no more, The fathers have eaten sour grapes, and the children"s teeth are set on edge.

name: Jeremiah 31:30
text: But everyone shall die for his own iniquity: every man who eats the sour grapes, his teeth shall be set on edge.

name: Jeremiah 31:31
text: Behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel, and with the house of Judah:

name: Jeremiah 31:32
text: not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day that I took them by the hand to bring them out of the land of Egypt; which my covenant they broke, although I was a husband to them, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 31:33
text: But this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days, says Yahweh: I will put my law in their inward parts, and in their heart will I write it; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people:

name: Jeremiah 31:34
text: and they shall teach no more every man his neighbor, and every man his brother, saying, Know Yahweh; for they shall all know me, from their least to their greatest, says Yahweh: for I will forgive their iniquity, and their sin will I remember no more.

name: Jeremiah 31:35
text: Thus says Yahweh, who gives the sun for a light by day, and the ordinances of the moon and of the stars for a light by night, who stirs up the sea, so that its waves roar; Yahweh of Armies is his name:

name: Jeremiah 31:36
text: If these ordinances depart from before me, says Yahweh, then the seed of Israel also shall cease from being a nation before me forever.

name: Jeremiah 31:37
text: Thus says Yahweh: If heaven above can be measured, and the foundations of the earth searched out beneath, then will I also cast off all the seed of Israel for all that they have done, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 31:38
text: Behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that the city shall be built to Yahweh from the tower of Hananel to the gate of the corner.

name: Jeremiah 31:39
text: The measuring line shall go out further straight onward to the hill Gareb, and shall turn about to Goah.

name: Jeremiah 31:40
text: The whole valley of the dead bodies and of the ashes, and all the fields to the brook Kidron, to the corner of the horse gate toward the east, shall be holy to Yahweh; it shall not be plucked up, nor thrown down any more forever.

name: Jeremiah 32:1
text: The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh in the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, which was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar.

name: Jeremiah 32:2
text: Now at that time the king of Babylon"s army was besieging Jerusalem; and Jeremiah the prophet was shut up in the court of the guard, which was in the king of Judah"s house.

name: Jeremiah 32:3
text: For Zedekiah king of Judah had shut him up, saying, Why do you prophesy, and say, Thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will give this city into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall take it;

name: Jeremiah 32:4
text: and Zedekiah king of Judah shall not escape out of the hand of the Chaldeans, but shall surely be delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon, and shall speak with him mouth to mouth, and his eyes shall see his eyes;

name: Jeremiah 32:5
text: and he shall bring Zedekiah to Babylon, and he shall be there until I visit him, says Yahweh: though you fight with the Chaldeans, you shall not prosper?

name: Jeremiah 32:6
text: Jeremiah said, The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Jeremiah 32:7
text: Behold, Hanamel the son of Shallum your uncle shall come to you, saying, Buy my field that is in Anathoth; for the right of redemption is yours to buy it.

name: Jeremiah 32:8
text: So Hanamel my uncle"s son came to me in the court of the guard according to the word of Yahweh, and said to me, Please buy my field that is in Anathoth, which is in the land of Benjamin; for the right of inheritance is yours, and the redemption is yours; buy it for yourself. Then I knew that this was the word of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 32:9
text: I bought the field that was in Anathoth of Hanamel my uncle"s son, and weighed him the money, even seventeen shekels of silver.

name: Jeremiah 32:10
text: I subscribed the deed, and sealed it, and called witnesses, and weighed him the money in the balances.

name: Jeremiah 32:11
text: So I took the deed of the purchase, both that which was sealed, containing the terms and conditions, and that which was open;

name: Jeremiah 32:12
text: and I delivered the deed of the purchase to Baruch the son of Neriah, the son of Mahseiah, in the presence of Hanamel my uncle"s son, and in the presence of the witnesses who subscribed the deed of the purchase, before all the Jews who sat in the court of the guard.

name: Jeremiah 32:13
text: I commanded Baruch before them, saying,

name: Jeremiah 32:14
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Take these deeds, this deed of the purchase which is sealed, and this deed which is open, and put them in an earthen vessel; that they may continue many days.

name: Jeremiah 32:15
text: For thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Houses and fields and vineyards shall yet again be bought in this land.

name: Jeremiah 32:16
text: Now after I had delivered the deed of the purchase to Baruch the son of Neriah, I prayed to Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 32:17
text: Ah Lord Yahweh! Behold, you have made the heavens and the earth by your great power and by your outstretched arm; there is nothing too hard for you,

name: Jeremiah 32:18
text: who show loving kindness to thousands, and recompense the iniquity of the fathers into the bosom of their children after them; the great, the mighty God, Yahweh of Armies is his name;

name: Jeremiah 32:19
text: great in counsel, and mighty in work; whose eyes are open on all the ways of the sons of men, to give everyone according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings:

name: Jeremiah 32:20
text: who performed signs and wonders in the land of Egypt, even to this day, both in Israel and among other men; and made yourself a name, as in this day;

name: Jeremiah 32:21
text: and brought forth your people Israel out of the land of Egypt with signs, and with wonders, and with a strong hand, and with an outstretched arm, and with great terror;

name: Jeremiah 32:22
text: and gave them this land, which you swore to their fathers to give them, a land flowing with milk and honey;

name: Jeremiah 32:23
text: and they came in, and possessed it, but they didn"t obey your voice, neither walked in your law; they have done nothing of all that you commanded them to do: therefore you have caused all this evil to come on them.

name: Jeremiah 32:24
text: Behold, the mounds, they have come to the city to take it; and the city is given into the hand of the Chaldeans who fight against it, because of the sword, and of the famine, and of the pestilence; and what you have spoken has happened; and behold, you see it.

name: Jeremiah 32:25
text: You have said to me, Lord Yahweh, Buy the field for money, and call witnesses; whereas the city is given into the hand of the Chaldeans.

name: Jeremiah 32:26
text: Then came the word of Yahweh to Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 32:27
text: Behold, I am Yahweh, the God of all flesh: is there anything too hard for me?

name: Jeremiah 32:28
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh: Behold, I will give this city into the hand of the Chaldeans, and into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and he shall take it:

name: Jeremiah 32:29
text: and the Chaldeans, who fight against this city, shall come and set this city on fire, and burn it, with the houses, on whose roofs they have offered incense to Baal, and poured out drink offerings to other gods, to provoke me to anger.

name: Jeremiah 32:30
text: For the children of Israel and the children of Judah have done only that which was evil in my sight from their youth; for the children of Israel have only provoked me to anger with the work of their hands, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 32:31
text: For this city has been to me a provocation of my anger and of my wrath from the day that they built it even to this day; that I should remove it from before my face,

name: Jeremiah 32:32
text: because of all the evil of the children of Israel and of the children of Judah, which they have done to provoke me to anger, they, their kings, their princes, their priests, and their prophets, and the men of Judah, and the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 32:33
text: They have turned to me the back, and not the face: and though I taught them, rising up early and teaching them, yet they have not listened to receive instruction.

name: Jeremiah 32:34
text: But they set their abominations in the house which is called by my name, to defile it.

name: Jeremiah 32:35
text: They built the high places of Baal, which are in the valley of the son of Hinnom, to cause their sons and their daughters to pass through fire to Molech; which I didn"t command them, neither did it come into my mind, that they should do this abomination, to cause Judah to sin.

name: Jeremiah 32:36
text: Now therefore thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, concerning this city, about which you say, It is given into the hand of the king of Babylon by the sword, and by the famine, and by the pestilence:

name: Jeremiah 32:37
text: Behold, I will gather them out of all the countries, where I have driven them in my anger, and in my wrath, and in great indignation; and I will bring them again to this place, and I will cause them to dwell safely:

name: Jeremiah 32:38
text: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God:

name: Jeremiah 32:39
text: and I will give them one heart and one way, that they may fear me forever, for their good, and of their children after them:

name: Jeremiah 32:40
text: and I will make an everlasting covenant with them, that I will not turn away from following them, to do them good; and I will put my fear in their hearts, that they may not depart from me.

name: Jeremiah 32:41
text: Yes, I will rejoice over them to do them good, and I will plant them in this land assuredly with my whole heart and with my whole soul.

name: Jeremiah 32:42
text: For thus says Yahweh: Like as I have brought all this great evil on this people, so will I bring on them all the good that I have promised them.

name: Jeremiah 32:43
text: Fields shall be bought in this land, about which you say, It is desolate, without man or animal; it is given into the hand of the Chaldeans.

name: Jeremiah 32:44
text: Men shall buy fields for money, and subscribe the deeds, and seal them, and call witnesses, in the land of Benjamin, and in the places about Jerusalem, and in the cities of Judah, and in the cities of the hill country, and in the cities of the lowland, and in the cities of the South: for I will cause their captivity to return, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 33:1
text: Moreover the word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah the second time, while he was yet shut up in the court of the guard, saying,

name: Jeremiah 33:2
text: Thus says Yahweh who does it, Yahweh who forms it to establish it; Yahweh is his name:

name: Jeremiah 33:3
text: Call to me, and I will answer you, and will show you great things, and difficult, which you don"t know.

name: Jeremiah 33:4
text: For thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, concerning the houses of this city, and concerning the houses of the kings of Judah, which are broken down to make a defense against the mounds and against the sword;

name: Jeremiah 33:5
text: while men come to fight with the Chaldeans, and to fill them with the dead bodies of men, whom I have killed in my anger and in my wrath, and for all whose wickedness I have hidden my face from this city:

name: Jeremiah 33:6
text: Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them; and I will reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

name: Jeremiah 33:7
text: I will cause the captivity of Judah and the captivity of Israel to return, and will build them, as at the first.

name: Jeremiah 33:8
text: I will cleanse them from all their iniquity, by which they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities, by which they have sinned against me, and by which they have transgressed against me.

name: Jeremiah 33:9
text: This city shall be to me for a name of joy, for a praise and for a glory, before all the nations of the earth, which shall hear all the good that I do to them, and shall fear and tremble for all the good and for all the peace that I procure to it.

name: Jeremiah 33:10
text: Thus says Yahweh: Yet again there shall be heard in this place, about which you say, It is waste, without man and without animal, even in the cities of Judah, and in the streets of Jerusalem, that are desolate, without man and without inhabitant and without animal,

name: Jeremiah 33:11
text: the voice of joy and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom and the voice of the bride, the voice of those who say, Give thanks to Yahweh of Armies, for Yahweh is good, for his loving kindness endures forever; who bring thanksgiving into the house of Yahweh. For I will cause the captivity of the land to return as at the first, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 33:12
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies: Yet again shall there be in this place, which is waste, without man and without animal, and in all its cities, a habitation of shepherds causing their flocks to lie down.

name: Jeremiah 33:13
text: In the cities of the hill country, in the cities of the lowland, and in the cities of the South, and in the land of Benjamin, and in the places about Jerusalem, and in the cities of Judah, shall the flocks again pass under the hands of him who numbers them, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 33:14
text: Behold, the days come, says Yahweh, that I will perform that good word which I have spoken concerning the house of Israel and concerning the house of Judah.

name: Jeremiah 33:15
text: In those days, and at that time, will I cause a Branch of righteousness to grow up to David; and he shall execute justice and righteousness in the land.

name: Jeremiah 33:16
text: In those days shall Judah be saved, and Jerusalem shall dwell safely; and this is the name by which she shall be called: Yahweh our righteousness.

name: Jeremiah 33:17
text: For thus says Yahweh: David shall never want a man to sit on the throne of the house of Israel;

name: Jeremiah 33:18
text: neither shall the priests the Levites want a man before me to offer burnt offerings, and to burn meal offerings, and to do sacrifice continually.

name: Jeremiah 33:19
text: The word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 33:20
text: Thus says Yahweh: If you can break my covenant of the day, and my covenant of the night, so that there shall not be day and night in their season;

name: Jeremiah 33:21
text: then may also my covenant be broken with David my servant, that he shall not have a son to reign on his throne; and with the Levites the priests, my ministers.

name: Jeremiah 33:22
text: As the army of the sky can"t be numbered, neither the sand of the sea measured; so will I multiply the seed of David my servant, and the Levites who minister to me.

name: Jeremiah 33:23
text: The word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 33:24
text: Don"t consider what this people has spoken, saying, The two families which Yahweh chose, he has cast them off? thus do they despise my people, that they should be no more a nation before them.

name: Jeremiah 33:25
text: Thus says Yahweh: If my covenant of day and night fails, if I have not appointed the ordinances of heaven and earth;

name: Jeremiah 33:26
text: then will I also cast away the seed of Jacob, and of David my servant, so that I will not take of his seed to be rulers over the seed of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob: for I will cause their captivity to return, and will have mercy on them.

name: Jeremiah 34:1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and all his army, and all the kingdoms of the earth that were under his dominion, and all the peoples, were fighting against Jerusalem, and against all the cities of it, saying:

name: Jeremiah 34:2
text: Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, Go, and speak to Zedekiah king of Judah, and tell him, Thus says Yahweh, Behold, I will give this city into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall burn it with fire:

name: Jeremiah 34:3
text: and you shall not escape out of his hand, but shall surely be taken, and delivered into his hand; and your eyes shall see the eyes of the king of Babylon, and he shall speak with you mouth to mouth, and you shall go to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 34:4
text: Yet hear the word of Yahweh, O Zedekiah king of Judah: thus says Yahweh concerning you, You shall not die by the sword;

name: Jeremiah 34:5
text: you shall die in peace; and with the burnings of your fathers, the former kings who were before you, so shall they make a burning for you; and they shall lament you, saying, Ah Lord! for I have spoken the word, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 34:6
text: Then Jeremiah the prophet spoke all these words to Zedekiah king of Judah in Jerusalem,

name: Jeremiah 34:7
text: when the king of Babylon"s army was fighting against Jerusalem, and against all the cities of Judah that were left, against Lachish and against Azekah; for these alone remained of the cities of Judah as fortified cities.

name: Jeremiah 34:8
text: The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, after that the king Zedekiah had made a covenant with all the people who were at Jerusalem, to proclaim liberty to them;

name: Jeremiah 34:9
text: that every man should let his male servant, and every man his female servant, who is a Hebrew or a Hebrewess, go free; that none should make bondservants of them, of a Jew his brother.

name: Jeremiah 34:10
text: All the princes and all the people obeyed, who had entered into the covenant, that everyone should let his male servant, and everyone his female servant, go free, that none should make bondservants of them any more; they obeyed, and let them go:

name: Jeremiah 34:11
text: but afterwards they turned, and caused the servants and the handmaids, whom they had let go free, to return, and brought them into subjection for servants and for handmaids.

name: Jeremiah 34:12
text: Therefore the word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 34:13
text: Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel: I made a covenant with your fathers in the day that I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage, saying,

name: Jeremiah 34:14
text: At the end of seven years you shall let go every man his brother who is a Hebrew, who has been sold to you, and has served you six years, you shall let him go free from you: but your fathers didn"t listen to me, neither inclined their ear.

name: Jeremiah 34:15
text: You had now turned, and had done that which is right in my eyes, in proclaiming liberty every man to his neighbor; and you had made a covenant before me in the house which is called by my name:

name: Jeremiah 34:16
text: but you turned and profaned my name, and caused every man his servant, and every man his handmaid, whom you had let go free at their pleasure, to return; and you brought them into subjection, to be to you for servants and for handmaids.

name: Jeremiah 34:17
text: Therefore thus says Yahweh: you have not listened to me, to proclaim liberty, every man to his brother, and every man to his neighbor: behold, I proclaim to you a liberty, says Yahweh, to the sword, to the pestilence, and to the famine; and I will make you to be tossed back and forth among all the kingdoms of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 34:18
text: I will give the men who have transgressed my covenant, who have not performed the words of the covenant which they made before me, when they cut the calf in two and passed between its parts;

name: Jeremiah 34:19
text: the princes of Judah, and the princes of Jerusalem, the eunuchs, and the priests, and all the people of the land, who passed between the parts of the calf;

name: Jeremiah 34:20
text: I will even give them into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of those who seek their life; and their dead bodies shall be for food to the birds of the sky, and to the animals of the earth.

name: Jeremiah 34:21
text: Zedekiah king of Judah and his princes will I give into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of those who seek their life, and into the hand of the king of Babylon"s army, who have gone away from you.

name: Jeremiah 34:22
text: Behold, I will command, says Yahweh, and cause them to return to this city; and they shall fight against it, and take it, and burn it with fire: and I will make the cities of Judah a desolation, without inhabitant.

name: Jeremiah 35:1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 35:2
text: Go to the house of the Rechabites, and speak to them, and bring them into the house of Yahweh, into one of the rooms, and give them wine to drink.

name: Jeremiah 35:3
text: Then I took Jaazaniah the son of Jeremiah, the son of Habazziniah, and his brothers, and all his sons, and the whole house of the Rechabites;

name: Jeremiah 35:4
text: and I brought them into the house of Yahweh, into the room of the sons of Hanan the son of Igdaliah, the man of God, which was by the room of the princes, which was above the room of Maaseiah the son of Shallum, the keeper of the threshold.

name: Jeremiah 35:5
text: I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites bowls full of wine, and cups; and I said to them, Drink wine!

name: Jeremiah 35:6
text: But they said, We will drink no wine; for Jonadab the son of Rechab, our father, commanded us, saying, You shall drink no wine, neither you, nor your sons, forever:

name: Jeremiah 35:7
text: neither shall you build house, nor sow seed, nor plant vineyard, nor have any; but all your days you shall dwell in tents; that you may live many days in the land in which you live.

name: Jeremiah 35:8
text: We have obeyed the voice of Jonadab the son of Rechab, our father, in all that he commanded us, to drink no wine all our days, we, our wives, our sons, or our daughters;

name: Jeremiah 35:9
text: nor to build houses for us to dwell in; neither have we vineyard, nor field, nor seed:

name: Jeremiah 35:10
text: but we have lived in tents, and have obeyed, and done according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.

name: Jeremiah 35:11
text: But it happened, when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up into the land, that we said, Come, and let us go to Jerusalem for fear of the army of the Chaldeans, and for fear of the army of the Syrians; so we dwell at Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 35:12
text: Then came the word of Yahweh to Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 35:13
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Go, and tell the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem, Will you not receive instruction to listen to my words? says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 35:14
text: The words of Jonadab the son of Rechab, that he commanded his sons, not to drink wine, are performed; and to this day they drink none, for they obey their father"s commandment: but I have spoken to you, rising up early and speaking; and you have not listened to me.

name: Jeremiah 35:15
text: I have sent also to you all my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them, saying, Return now every man from his evil way, and amend your doings, and don"t go after other gods to serve them, and you shall dwell in the land which I have given to you and to your fathers: but you have not inclined your ear, nor listened to me.

name: Jeremiah 35:16
text: Because the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have performed the commandment of their father which he commanded them, but this people has not listened to me;

name: Jeremiah 35:17
text: therefore thus says Yahweh, the God of Armies, the God of Israel: Behold, I will bring on Judah and on all the inhabitants of Jerusalem all the evil that I have pronounced against them; because I have spoken to them, but they have not heard; and I have called to them, but they have not answered.

name: Jeremiah 35:18
text: Jeremiah said to the house of the Rechabites, Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Because you have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father, and kept all his precepts, and done according to all that he commanded you;

name: Jeremiah 35:19
text: therefore thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Jonadab the son of Rechab shall not want a man to stand before me forever.

name: Jeremiah 36:1
text: It happened in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, that this word came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

name: Jeremiah 36:2
text: Take a scroll of a book, and write therein all the words that I have spoken to you against Israel, and against Judah, and against all the nations, from the day I spoke to you, from the days of Josiah, even to this day.

name: Jeremiah 36:3
text: It may be that the house of Judah will hear all the evil which I purpose to do to them; that they may return every man from his evil way; that I may forgive their iniquity and their sin.

name: Jeremiah 36:4
text: Then Jeremiah called Baruch the son of Neriah; and Baruch wrote from the mouth of Jeremiah all the words of Yahweh, which he had spoken to him, on a scroll of a book.

name: Jeremiah 36:5
text: Jeremiah commanded Baruch, saying, I am shut up; I can"t go into the house of Yahweh:

name: Jeremiah 36:6
text: therefore you go, and read in the scroll, which you have written from my mouth, the words of Yahweh in the ears of the people in Yahweh"s house on the fast day; and also you shall read them in the ears of all Judah who come out of their cities.

name: Jeremiah 36:7
text: It may be they will present their supplication before Yahweh, and will return everyone from his evil way; for great is the anger and the wrath that Yahweh has pronounced against this people.

name: Jeremiah 36:8
text: Baruch the son of Neriah did according to all that Jeremiah the prophet commanded him, reading in the book the words of Yahweh in Yahweh"s house.

name: Jeremiah 36:9
text: Now it happened in the fifth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, in the ninth month, that all the people in Jerusalem, and all the people who came from the cities of Judah to Jerusalem, proclaimed a fast before Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 36:10
text: Then read Baruch in the book the words of Jeremiah in the house of Yahweh, in the room of Gemariah the son of Shaphan, the scribe, in the upper court, at the entry of the new gate of Yahweh"s house, in the ears of all the people.

name: Jeremiah 36:11
text: When Micaiah the son of Gemariah, the son of Shaphan, had heard out of the book all the words of Yahweh,

name: Jeremiah 36:12
text: he went down into the king"s house, into the scribe"s room: and behold, all the princes were sitting there, Elishama the scribe, and Delaiah the son of Shemaiah, and Elnathan the son of Achbor, and Gemariah the son of Shaphan, and Zedekiah the son of Hananiah, and all the princes.

name: Jeremiah 36:13
text: Then Micaiah declared to them all the words that he had heard, when Baruch read the book in the ears of the people.

name: Jeremiah 36:14
text: Therefore all the princes sent Jehudi the son of Nethaniah, the son of Shelemiah, the son of Cushi, to Baruch, saying, Take in your hand the scroll in which you have read in the ears of the people, and come. So Baruch the son of Neriah took the scroll in his hand, and came to them.

name: Jeremiah 36:15
text: They said to him, Sit down now, and read it in our ears. So Baruch read it in their ears.

name: Jeremiah 36:16
text: Now it happened, when they had heard all the words, they turned in fear one toward another, and said to Baruch, We will surely tell the king of all these words.

name: Jeremiah 36:17
text: They asked Baruch, saying, Tell us now, How did you write all these words at his mouth?

name: Jeremiah 36:18
text: Then Baruch answered them, He pronounced all these words to me with his mouth, and I wrote them with ink in the book.

name: Jeremiah 36:19
text: Then the princes said to Baruch, Go, hide, you and Jeremiah; and let no man know where you are.

name: Jeremiah 36:20
text: They went in to the king into the court; but they had laid up the scroll in the room of Elishama the scribe; and they told all the words in the ears of the king.

name: Jeremiah 36:21
text: So the king sent Jehudi to get the scroll; and he took it out of the room of Elishama the scribe. Jehudi read it in the ears of the king, and in the ears of all the princes who stood beside the king.

name: Jeremiah 36:22
text: Now the king was sitting in the winter house in the ninth month: and there was a fire in the brazier burning before him.

name: Jeremiah 36:23
text: It happened, when Jehudi had read three or four leaves, that the king cut it with the penknife, and cast it into the fire that was in the brazier, until all the scroll was consumed in the fire that was in the brazier.

name: Jeremiah 36:24
text: They were not afraid, nor tore their garments, neither the king, nor any of his servants who heard all these words.

name: Jeremiah 36:25
text: Moreover Elnathan and Delaiah and Gemariah had made intercession to the king that he would not burn the scroll; but he would not hear them.

name: Jeremiah 36:26
text: The king commanded Jerahmeel the king"s son, and Seraiah the son of Azriel, and Shelemiah the son of Abdeel, to take Baruch the scribe and Jeremiah the prophet; but Yahweh hid them.

name: Jeremiah 36:27
text: Then the word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah, after that the king had burned the scroll, and the words which Baruch wrote at the mouth of Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 36:28
text: Take again another scroll, and write in it all the former words that were in the first scroll, which Jehoiakim the king of Judah has burned.

name: Jeremiah 36:29
text: Concerning Jehoiakim king of Judah you shall say, Thus says Yahweh: You have burned this scroll, saying, Why have you written therein, saying, The king of Babylon shall certainly come and destroy this land, and shall cause to cease from there man and animal?

name: Jeremiah 36:30
