text: Therefore thus says Yahweh concerning Jehoiakim king of Judah: He shall have none to sit on the throne of David; and his dead body shall be cast out in the day to the heat, and in the night to the frost.

name: Jeremiah 36:31
text: I will punish him and his seed and his servants for their iniquity; and I will bring on them, and on the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and on the men of Judah, all the evil that I have pronounced against them, but they didn"t listen.

name: Jeremiah 36:32
text: Then took Jeremiah another scroll, and gave it to Baruch the scribe, the son of Neriah, who wrote therein from the mouth of Jeremiah all the words of the book which Jehoiakim king of Judah had burned in the fire; and there were added besides to them many like words.

name: Jeremiah 37:1
text: Zedekiah the son of Josiah reigned as king, instead of Coniah the son of Jehoiakim, whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon made king in the land of Judah.

name: Jeremiah 37:2
text: But neither he, nor his servants, nor the people of the land, listened to the words of Yahweh, which he spoke by the prophet Jeremiah.

name: Jeremiah 37:3
text: Zedekiah the king sent Jehucal the son of Shelemiah, and Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah, the priest, to the prophet Jeremiah, saying, Pray now to Yahweh our God for us.

name: Jeremiah 37:4
text: Now Jeremiah came in and went out among the people; for they had not put him into prison.

name: Jeremiah 37:5
text: Pharaoh"s army had come forth out of Egypt; and when the Chaldeans who were besieging Jerusalem heard news of them, they broke up from Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 37:6
text: Then came the word of Yahweh to the prophet Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 37:7
text: Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, You shall tell the king of Judah, who sent you to me to inquire of me: Behold, Pharaoh"s army, which has come forth to help you, shall return to Egypt into their own land.

name: Jeremiah 37:8
text: The Chaldeans shall come again, and fight against this city; and they shall take it, and burn it with fire.

name: Jeremiah 37:9
text: Thus says Yahweh, Don"t deceive yourselves, saying, The Chaldeans shall surely depart from us; for they shall not depart.

name: Jeremiah 37:10
text: For though you had struck the whole army of the Chaldeans who fight against you, and there remained but wounded men among them, yes would they rise up every man in his tent, and burn this city with fire.

name: Jeremiah 37:11
text: It happened that, when the army of the Chaldeans was broken up from Jerusalem for fear of Pharaoh"s army,

name: Jeremiah 37:12
text: then Jeremiah went forth out of Jerusalem to go into the land of Benjamin, to receive his portion there, in the midst of the people.

name: Jeremiah 37:13
text: When he was in the gate of Benjamin, a captain of the guard was there, whose name was Irijah, the son of Shelemiah, the son of Hananiah; and he laid hold on Jeremiah the prophet, saying, You are falling away to the Chaldeans.

name: Jeremiah 37:14
text: Then Jeremiah said, It is false; I am not falling away to the Chaldeans. But he didn"t listen to him; so Irijah laid hold on Jeremiah, and brought him to the princes.

name: Jeremiah 37:15
text: The princes were angry with Jeremiah, and struck him, and put him in prison in the house of Jonathan the scribe; for they had made that the prison.

name: Jeremiah 37:16
text: When Jeremiah had come into the dungeon house, and into the cells, and Jeremiah had remained there many days;

name: Jeremiah 37:17
text: Then Zedekiah the king sent, and fetched him: and the king asked him secretly in his house, and said, Is there any word from Yahweh? Jeremiah said, There is. He said also, You shall be delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 37:18
text: Moreover Jeremiah said to king Zedekiah, Wherein have I sinned against you, or against your servants, or against this people, that you have put me in prison?

name: Jeremiah 37:19
text: Where now are your prophets who prophesied to you, saying, The king of Babylon shall not come against you, nor against this land?

name: Jeremiah 37:20
text: Now please hear, my lord the king: please let my supplication be presented before you, that you not cause me to return to the house of Jonathan the scribe, lest I die there.

name: Jeremiah 37:21
text: Then Zedekiah the king commanded, and they committed Jeremiah into the court of the guard; and they gave him daily a loaf of bread out of the bakers" street, until all the bread in the city was spent. Thus Jeremiah remained in the court of the guard.

name: Jeremiah 38:1
text: Shephatiah the son of Mattan, and Gedaliah the son of Pashhur, and Jucal the son of Shelemiah, and Pashhur the son of Malchijah, heard the words that Jeremiah spoke to all the people, saying,

name: Jeremiah 38:2
text: Thus says Yahweh, He who remains in this city shall die by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence; but he who goes forth to the Chaldeans shall live, and his life shall be to him for a prey, and he shall live.

name: Jeremiah 38:3
text: Thus says Yahweh, This city shall surely be given into the hand of the army of the king of Babylon, and he shall take it.

name: Jeremiah 38:4
text: Then the princes said to the king, "Please let this man be put to death; because he weakens the hands of the men of war who remain in this city, and the hands of all the people, in speaking such words to them: for this man doesn"t seek the welfare of this people, but the hurt."

name: Jeremiah 38:5
text: Zedekiah the king said, Behold, he is in your hand; for the king is not he who can do anything against you.

name: Jeremiah 38:6
text: Then took they Jeremiah, and cast him into the dungeon of Malchijah the king"s son, that was in the court of the guard: and they let down Jeremiah with cords. In the dungeon there was no water, but mire; and Jeremiah sank in the mire.

name: Jeremiah 38:7
text: Now when Ebedmelech the Ethiopian, a eunuch, who was in the king"s house, heard that they had put Jeremiah in the dungeon (the king then sitting in the gate of Benjamin),

name: Jeremiah 38:8
text: Ebedmelech went forth out of the king"s house, and spoke to the king, saying,

name: Jeremiah 38:9
text: My lord the king, these men have done evil in all that they have done to Jeremiah the prophet, whom they have cast into the dungeon; and he is likely to die in the place where he is, because of the famine; for there is no more bread in the city.

name: Jeremiah 38:10
text: Then the king commanded Ebedmelech the Ethiopian, saying, Take from here thirty men with you, and take up Jeremiah the prophet out of the dungeon, before he dies.

name: Jeremiah 38:11
text: So Ebedmelech took the men with him, and went into the house of the king under the treasury, and took there rags and worn-out garments, and let them down by cords into the dungeon to Jeremiah.

name: Jeremiah 38:12
text: Ebedmelech the Ethiopian said to Jeremiah, Put now these rags and worn-out garments under your armpits under the cords. Jeremiah did so.

name: Jeremiah 38:13
text: So they drew up Jeremiah with the cords, and took him up out of the dungeon: and Jeremiah remained in the court of the guard.

name: Jeremiah 38:14
text: Then Zedekiah the king sent, and took Jeremiah the prophet to him into the third entry that is in the house of Yahweh: and the king said to Jeremiah, I will ask you something. Hide nothing from me.

name: Jeremiah 38:15
text: Then Jeremiah said to Zedekiah, If I declare it to you, will you not surely put me to death? and if I give you counsel, you will not listen to me.

name: Jeremiah 38:16
text: So Zedekiah the king swore secretly to Jeremiah, saying, As Yahweh lives, who made us this soul, I will not put you to death, neither will I give you into the hand of these men who seek your life.

name: Jeremiah 38:17
text: Then Jeremiah said to Zedekiah, Thus says Yahweh, the God of Armies, the God of Israel: If you will go forth to the king of Babylon"s princes, then your soul shall live, and this city shall not be burned with fire; and you shall live, and your house.

name: Jeremiah 38:18
text: But if you will not go forth to the king of Babylon"s princes, then shall this city be given into the hand of the Chaldeans, and they shall burn it with fire, and you shall not escape out of their hand.

name: Jeremiah 38:19
text: Zedekiah the king said to Jeremiah, I am afraid of the Jews who are fallen away to the Chaldeans, lest they deliver me into their hand, and they mock me.

name: Jeremiah 38:20
text: But Jeremiah said, They shall not deliver you. Obey, I beg you, the voice of Yahweh, in that which I speak to you: so it shall be well with you, and your soul shall live.

name: Jeremiah 38:21
text: But if you refuse to go forth, this is the word that Yahweh has shown me:

name: Jeremiah 38:22
text: behold, all the women who are left in the king of Judah"s house shall be brought forth to the king of Babylon"s princes, and those women shall say, Your familiar friends have set you on, and have prevailed over you. Your feet are sunk in the mire, they have turned away back.

name: Jeremiah 38:23
text: They shall bring out all your wives and your children to the Chaldeans; and you shall not escape out of their hand, but shall be taken by the hand of the king of Babylon: and you shall cause this city to be burned with fire.

name: Jeremiah 38:24
text: Then Zedekiah said to Jeremiah, Let no man know of these words, and you shall not die.

name: Jeremiah 38:25
text: But if the princes hear that I have talked with you, and they come to you, and tell you, Declare to us now what you have said to the king; don"t hide it from us, and we will not put you to death; also what the king said to you:

name: Jeremiah 38:26
text: then you shall tell them, I presented my supplication before the king, that he would not cause me to return to Jonathan"s house, to die there.

name: Jeremiah 38:27
text: Then came all the princes to Jeremiah, and asked him; and he told them according to all these words that the king had commanded. So they left off speaking with him; for the matter was not perceived.

name: Jeremiah 38:28
text: So Jeremiah stayed in the court of the guard until the day that Jerusalem was taken.

name: Jeremiah 39:1
text: It happened when Jerusalem was taken, (in the ninth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the tenth month, came Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon and all his army against Jerusalem, and besieged it;

name: Jeremiah 39:2
text: in the eleventh year of Zedekiah, in the fourth month, the ninth day of the month, a breach was made in the city),

name: Jeremiah 39:3
text: that all the princes of the king of Babylon came in, and sat in the middle gate, Nergal Sharezer, Samgarnebo, Sarsechim, Rabsaris, Nergal Sharezer, Rabmag, with all the rest of the princes of the king of Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 39:4
text: It happened that, when Zedekiah the king of Judah and all the men of war saw them, then they fled, and went forth out of the city by night, by the way of the king"s garden, through the gate between the two walls; and he went out toward the Arabah.

name: Jeremiah 39:5
text: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued after them, and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho: and when they had taken him, they brought him up to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon to Riblah in the land of Hamath; and he gave judgment on him.

name: Jeremiah 39:6
text: Then the king of Babylon killed the sons of Zedekiah in Riblah before his eyes: also the king of Babylon killed all the nobles of Judah.

name: Jeremiah 39:7
text: Moreover he put out Zedekiah"s eyes, and bound him in fetters, to carry him to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 39:8
text: The Chaldeans burned the king"s house, and the houses of the people, with fire, and broke down the walls of Jerusalem.

name: Jeremiah 39:9
text: Then Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard carried away captive into Babylon the residue of the people who remained in the city, the deserters also who fell away to him, and the residue of the people who remained.

name: Jeremiah 39:10
text: But Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard left of the poor of the people, who had nothing, in the land of Judah, and gave them vineyards and fields at the same time.

name: Jeremiah 39:11
text: Now Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon commanded Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard concerning Jeremiah, saying,

name: Jeremiah 39:12
text: Take him, and look well to him, and do him no harm; but do to him even as he shall tell you.

name: Jeremiah 39:13
text: So Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard sent, and Nebushazban, Rabsaris, and Nergal Sharezer, Rabmag, and all the chief officers of the king of Babylon;

name: Jeremiah 39:14
text: they sent, and took Jeremiah out of the court of the guard, and committed him to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, that he should carry him home: so he lived among the people.

name: Jeremiah 39:15
text: Now the word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah, while he was shut up in the court of the guard, saying,

name: Jeremiah 39:16
text: Go, and speak to Ebedmelech the Ethiopian, saying, Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Behold, I will bring my words on this city for evil, and not for good; and they shall be accomplished before you in that day.

name: Jeremiah 39:17
text: But I will deliver you in that day, says Yahweh; and you shall not be given into the hand of the men of whom you are afraid.

name: Jeremiah 39:18
text: For I will surely save you, and you shall not fall by the sword, but your life shall be for a prey to you; because you have put your trust in me, says Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 40:1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, after that Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard had let him go from Ramah, when he had taken him being bound in chains among all the captives of Jerusalem and Judah, who were carried away captive to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 40:2
text: The captain of the guard took Jeremiah, and said to him, Yahweh your God pronounced this evil on this place;

name: Jeremiah 40:3
text: and Yahweh has brought it, and done according as he spoke: because you have sinned against Yahweh, and have not obeyed his voice, therefore this thing has come on you.

name: Jeremiah 40:4
text: Now, behold, I release you this day from the chains which are on your hand. If it seems good to you to come with me into Babylon, come, and I will take care of you; but if it seems bad to you to come with me into Babylon, don"t: behold, all the land is before you; where it seems good and right to you to go, there go.

name: Jeremiah 40:5
text: Now while he had not yet gone back, Go back then, he said, to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, whom the king of Babylon has made governor over the cities of Judah, and dwell with him among the people; or go wherever it seems right to you to go. So the captain of the guard gave him food and a present, and let him go.

name: Jeremiah 40:6
text: Then went Jeremiah to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam to Mizpah, and lived with him among the people who were left in the land.

name: Jeremiah 40:7
text: Now when all the captains of the forces who were in the fields, even they and their men, heard that the king of Babylon had made Gedaliah the son of Ahikam governor in the land, and had committed to him men, and women, and children, and of the poorest of the land, of those who were not carried away captive to Babylon;

name: Jeremiah 40:8
text: then they came to Gedaliah to Mizpah, Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and Johanan and Jonathan the sons of Kareah, and Seraiah the son of Tanhumeth, and the sons of Ephai the Netophathite, and Jezaniah the son of the Maacathite, they and their men.

name: Jeremiah 40:9
text: Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan swore to them and to their men, saying, Don"t be afraid to serve the Chaldeans: dwell in the land, and serve the king of Babylon, and it shall be well with you.

name: Jeremiah 40:10
text: As for me, behold, I will dwell at Mizpah, to stand before the Chaldeans who shall come to us: but you, gather wine and summer fruits and oil, and put them in your vessels, and dwell in your cities that you have taken.

name: Jeremiah 40:11
text: Likewise when all the Jews who were in Moab, and among the children of Ammon, and in Edom, and who were in all the countries, heard that the king of Babylon had left a remnant of Judah, and that he had set over them Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan;

name: Jeremiah 40:12
text: then all the Jews returned out of all places where they were driven, and came to the land of Judah, to Gedaliah, to Mizpah, and gathered wine and summer fruits very much.

name: Jeremiah 40:13
text: Moreover Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces who were in the fields, came to Gedaliah to Mizpah,

name: Jeremiah 40:14
text: and said to him, Do you know that Baalis the king of the children of Ammon has sent Ishmael the son of Nethaniah to take your life? But Gedaliah the son of Ahikam didn"t believe them.

name: Jeremiah 40:15
text: Then Johanan the son of Kareah spoke to Gedaliah in Mizpah secretly, saying, Please let me go, and I will kill Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and no man shall know it: why should he take your life, that all the Jews who are gathered to you should be scattered, and the remnant of Judah perish?

name: Jeremiah 40:16
text: But Gedaliah the son of Ahikam said to Johanan the son of Kareah, You shall not do this thing; for you speak falsely of Ishmael.

name: Jeremiah 41:1
text: Now it happened in the seventh month, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, the son of Elishama, of the seed royal and one of the chief officers of the king, and ten men with him, came to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam to Mizpah; and there they ate bread together in Mizpah.

name: Jeremiah 41:2
text: Then arose Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and the ten men who were with him, and struck Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan with the sword, and killed him, whom the king of Babylon had made governor over the land.

name: Jeremiah 41:3
text: Ishmael also killed all the Jews who were with him, with Gedaliah, at Mizpah, and the Chaldeans who were found there, the men of war.

name: Jeremiah 41:4
text: It happened the second day after he had killed Gedaliah, and no man knew it,

name: Jeremiah 41:5
text: that there came men from Shechem, from Shiloh, and from Samaria, even eighty men, having their beards shaved and their clothes torn, and having cut themselves, with meal offerings and frankincense in their hand, to bring them to the house of Yahweh.

name: Jeremiah 41:6
text: Ishmael the son of Nethaniah went forth from Mizpah to meet them, weeping all along as he went: and it happened, as he met them, he said to them, Come to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam.

name: Jeremiah 41:7
text: It was so, when they came into the midst of the city, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah killed them, and cast them into the midst of the pit, he, and the men who were with him.

name: Jeremiah 41:8
text: But ten men were found among those who said to Ishmael, Don"t kill us; for we have stores hidden in the field, of wheat, and of barley, and of oil, and of honey. So he stopped, and didn"t kill them among their brothers.

name: Jeremiah 41:9
text: Now the pit in which Ishmael cast all the dead bodies of the men whom he had killed, by the side of Gedaliah (the same was who which Asa the king had made for fear of Baasha king of Israel), Ishmael the son of Nethaniah filled it with those who were killed.

name: Jeremiah 41:10
text: Then Ishmael carried away captive all the residue of the people who were in Mizpah, even the king"s daughters, and all the people who remained in Mizpah, whom Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard had committed to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam; Ishmael the son of Nethaniah carried them away captive, and departed to go over to the children of Ammon.

name: Jeremiah 41:11
text: But when Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces who were with him, heard of all the evil that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah had done,

name: Jeremiah 41:12
text: then they took all the men, and went to fight with Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and found him by the great waters that are in Gibeon.

name: Jeremiah 41:13
text: Now it happened that, when all the people who were with Ishmael saw Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces who were with him, then they were glad.

name: Jeremiah 41:14
text: So all the people who Ishmael had carried away captive from Mizpah turned about and came back, and went to Johanan the son of Kareah.

name: Jeremiah 41:15
text: But Ishmael the son of Nethaniah escaped from Johanan with eight men, and went to the children of Ammon.

name: Jeremiah 41:16
text: Then took Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces who were with him, all the remnant of the people whom he had recovered from Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, from Mizpah, after that he had killed Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, the men of war, and the women, and the children, and the eunuchs, whom he had brought back from Gibeon:

name: Jeremiah 41:17
text: and they departed, and lived in Geruth Chimham, which is by Bethlehem, to go to enter into Egypt,

name: Jeremiah 41:18
text: because of the Chaldeans; for they were afraid of them, because Ishmael the son of Nethaniah had killed Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, whom the king of Babylon made governor over the land.

name: Jeremiah 42:1
text: Then all the captains of the forces, and Johanan the son of Kareah, and Jezaniah the son of Hoshaiah, and all the people from the least even to the greatest, came near,

name: Jeremiah 42:2
text: and said to Jeremiah the prophet, Please let our supplication be presented before you, and pray for us to Yahweh your God, even for all this remnant; for we are left but a few of many, as your eyes do see us:

name: Jeremiah 42:3
text: that Yahweh your God may show us the way in which we should walk, and the thing that we should do.

name: Jeremiah 42:4
text: Then Jeremiah the prophet said to them, I have heard you; behold, I will pray to Yahweh your God according to your words; and it shall happen that whatever thing Yahweh shall answer you, I will declare it to you; I will keep nothing back from you.

name: Jeremiah 42:5
text: Then they said to Jeremiah, Yahweh be a true and faithful witness among us, if we don"t do according to all the word with which Yahweh your God shall send you to us.

name: Jeremiah 42:6
text: Whether it be good, or whether it be evil, we will obey the voice of Yahweh our God, to whom we send you; that it may be well with us, when we obey the voice of Yahweh our God.

name: Jeremiah 42:7
text: It happened after ten days, that the word of Yahweh came to Jeremiah.

name: Jeremiah 42:8
text: Then called he Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces who were with him, and all the people from the least even to the greatest,

name: Jeremiah 42:9
text: and said to them, Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, to whom you sent me to present your supplication before him:

name: Jeremiah 42:10
text: If you will still live in this land, then will I build you, and not pull you down, and I will plant you, and not pluck you up; for I grieve over the distress that I have brought on you.

name: Jeremiah 42:11
text: Don"t be afraid of the king of Babylon, of whom you are afraid; don"t be afraid of him, says Yahweh: for I am with you to save you, and to deliver you from his hand.

name: Jeremiah 42:12
text: I will grant you mercy, that he may have mercy on you, and cause you to return to your own land.

name: Jeremiah 42:13
text: But if you say, We will not dwell in this land; so that you don"t obey the voice of Yahweh your God,

name: Jeremiah 42:14
text: saying, No; but we will go into the land of Egypt, where we shall see no war, nor hear the sound of the trumpet, nor have hunger of bread; and there will we dwell:

name: Jeremiah 42:15
text: now therefore hear the word of Yahweh, O remnant of Judah: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, If you indeed set your faces to enter into Egypt, and go to live there;

name: Jeremiah 42:16
text: then it shall happen, that the sword, which you fear, shall overtake you there in the land of Egypt; and the famine, about which you are afraid, shall follow close behind you there in Egypt; and there you shall die.

name: Jeremiah 42:17
text: So shall it be with all the men who set their faces to go into Egypt to live there: they shall die by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence; and none of them shall remain or escape from the evil that I will bring on them.

name: Jeremiah 42:18
text: For thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: As my anger and my wrath has been poured forth on the inhabitants of Jerusalem, so shall my wrath be poured forth on you, when you shall enter into Egypt; and you shall be an object of horror, and an astonishment, and a curse, and a reproach; and you shall see this place no more.

name: Jeremiah 42:19
text: Yahweh has spoken concerning you, remnant of Judah, Don"t you go into Egypt: know certainly that I have testified to you this day.

name: Jeremiah 42:20
text: For you have dealt deceitfully against your own souls; for you sent me to Yahweh your God, saying, Pray for us to Yahweh our God; and according to all that Yahweh our God shall say, so declare to us, and we will do it:

name: Jeremiah 42:21
text: and I have this day declared it to you; but you have not obeyed the voice of Yahweh your God in anything for which he has sent me to you.

name: Jeremiah 42:22
text: Now therefore know certainly that you shall die by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence, in the place where you desire to go to live there.

name: Jeremiah 43:1
text: It happened that, when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking to all the people all the words of Yahweh their God, with which Yahweh their God had sent him to them, even all these words,

name: Jeremiah 43:2
text: then spoke Azariah the son of Hoshaiah, and Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the proud men, saying to Jeremiah, You speak falsely: Yahweh our God has not sent you to say, You shall not go into Egypt to live there;

name: Jeremiah 43:3
text: but Baruch the son of Neriah sets you on against us, to deliver us into the hand of the Chaldeans, that they may put us to death, and carry us away captive to Babylon.

name: Jeremiah 43:4
text: So Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces, and all the people, didn"t obey the voice of Yahweh, to dwell in the land of Judah.

name: Jeremiah 43:5
text: But Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces, took all the remnant of Judah, who were returned from all the nations where they had been driven, to live in the land of Judah;

name: Jeremiah 43:6
text: the men, and the women, and the children, and the king"s daughters, and every person who Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard had left with Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan; and Jeremiah the prophet, and Baruch the son of Neriah;

name: Jeremiah 43:7
text: and they came into the land of Egypt; for they didn"t obey the voice of Yahweh: and they came to Tahpanhes.

name: Jeremiah 43:8
text: Then came the word of Yahweh to Jeremiah in Tahpanhes, saying,

name: Jeremiah 43:9
text: Take great stones in your hand, and hide them in mortar in the brick work, which is at the entry of Pharaoh"s house in Tahpanhes, in the sight of the men of Judah;

name: Jeremiah 43:10
text: and tell them, Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: Behold, I will send and take Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon, my servant, and will set his throne on these stones that I have hidden; and he shall spread his royal pavilion over them.

name: Jeremiah 43:11
text: He shall come, and shall strike the land of Egypt; such as are for death shall be put to death, and such as are for captivity to captivity, and such as are for the sword to the sword.

name: Jeremiah 43:12
text: I will kindle a fire in the houses of the gods of Egypt; and he shall burn them, and carry them away captive: and he shall array himself with the land of Egypt, as a shepherd puts on his garment; and he shall go forth from there in peace.

name: Jeremiah 43:13
text: He shall also break the pillars of Beth Shemesh, that is in the land of Egypt; and the houses of the gods of Egypt shall he burn with fire.

name: Jeremiah 44:1
text: The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the Jews who lived in the land of Egypt, who lived at Migdol, and at Tahpanhes, and at Memphis, and in the country of Pathros, saying,

name: Jeremiah 44:2
text: Thus says Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel: You have seen all the evil that I have brought on Jerusalem, and on all the cities of Judah; and behold, this day they are a desolation, and no man dwells therein,

name: Jeremiah 44:3
text: because of their wickedness which they have committed to provoke me to anger, in that they went to burn incense, to serve other gods, that they didn"t know, neither they, nor you, nor your fathers.

name: Jeremiah 44:4
text: However I sent to you all my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them, saying, Oh, don"t do this abominable thing that I hate.

name: Jeremiah 44:5
text: But they didn"t listen, nor inclined their ear to turn from their wickedness, to burn no incense to other gods.

name: Jeremiah 44:6
text: Therefore my wrath and my anger was poured forth, and was kindled in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem; and they are wasted and desolate, as it is this day.

name: Jeremiah 44:7
text: Therefore now thus says Yahweh, the God of Armies, the God of Israel: Why do you commit great evil against your own souls, to cut off from yourselves man and woman, infant and nursing child out of the midst of Judah, to leave yourselves none remaining;

name: Jeremiah 44:8
text: in that you provoke me to anger with the works of your hands, burning incense to other gods in the land of Egypt, where you have gone to live; that you may be cut off, and that you may be a curse and a reproach among all the nations of the earth?
